    16                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    17                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    18                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    19                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    20                                        
    21                                  ;------ Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    22                                  ;	at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    23                                  ;	moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    24                                  ;	Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    25                                  ;	SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    26                                  ;	(MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    27                                  
    28                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    29                                  
    30                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    31                                  ;
    32                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    33                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    34                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    35                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    36                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    37                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    38                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    39                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    40                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    41                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    42                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    43                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;
    47                                  ;bpbx		ends

   142                                  ;============================================================================
   143                                  ;
   144                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   145                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   146                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   147                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   148                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   149                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   150                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   151                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   152                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the

   494                                  ; Relocate
   495                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   496                                  ;
   497                                  ; NOTES:
   498                                  ;
   499                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   500                                  ;
   501                                  ; INPUT:     none
   502                                  ;
   503                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   504                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   505                                  ;
   506                                  ; calls:     none
   507                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   508                                  ;
   509                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   510                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   511                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   512                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   513                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   514                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   515                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   516                                  ;
   517                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   518                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   521                                  ;
   522                                  ; jump to relocated code

   648                                  ; FindClusterSize

   765                                  ; ReadInFirstClusters
   766                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   767                                  ;
   768                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   769                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   770                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   771                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   772                                  ;
   773                                  ; INPUT:
   774                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   775                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   776                                  ;
   777                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   778                                  ;   ClusterSize
   779                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   780                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   781                                  ;
   782                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   783                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   784                                  ;
   785                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   786                                  ; logic:
   787                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   788                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   789                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   790                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   791                                  ;	read in so far.
   792                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   793                                  
   794                                  ; 09/12/2022
   795                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   796                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   797                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in

   977                                  SetNextClusterNum:

   985                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   987                                  ;
   988                                  ; NOTES:
   989                                  ;
   990                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   991                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   992                                  ;
   993                                  ; INPUT:
   994                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   995                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   996                                  ;
   997                                  ; OUTPUT:
   998                                  ;	ES = 70h
   999                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
  1000                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1001                                  ;
  1002                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1003                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1004                                  ;
  1005                                  ; calls:     none
  1006                                  ;
  1007                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1008                                  ;
  1009                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1010                                  ;
  1011                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1012                                  ;
  1013                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1014                                  ;
  1015                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1016                                  
  1017                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1018                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1019                                  		;push	ds
  1020                                  		
  1021                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1022                                  		; ds = cs
  1023                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
  1024 000001A2 F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
  1025                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1026                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1027                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1028                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1029                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1030                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1031                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1032                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1033 000001A6 1E                      		push	ds
  1034                                  
  1035                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
  1036                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1038 000001AA 29F0                    		sub	ax, si
  1039 000001AC 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  1040

  1047 000001AF 1F                      		pop	ds

  1052                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di
  1053                                  		;;mov	[cs:NextBioLocation], di
  1054                                  
  1055                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1056                                  
  1057 000001B4 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
  1058                                  
  1059                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1060                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1061                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
  1062                                  
  1063                                  GetContigClusters:
  1064                                  
  1065                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1066                                  %if 0	
  1067                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1068                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1069                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1070                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1071                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1072                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1073                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1074                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1075                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1076                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1077                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1078                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1079                                  		dec	ax
  1080                                  		dec	ax
  1081                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1082                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1083                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1084                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1085                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1086                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1087                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1088                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1089                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1090                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1091                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1092                                  		mov	es, ax
  1093                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1094                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1095                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1096                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1097                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1098                                  %endif
  1099                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1100                                  		; ds = cs
  1101 000001B5 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1102 000001B8 A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1103                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1104 000001BB 50                      		push	ax
  1105 000001BC E8D400                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1106 000001BF 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]
  1107 000001C3 A3[0E00]                		mov	[CurrentCluster], ax	; Update the last one found
  1108                                  
  1109 000001C6 803E[2900]FF            		cmp	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh	; END_OF_FILE
  1110 000001CB 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022
  1111                                  		; 22/12/2022

  1121 000001CF F726[1200]              		mul	word [SecPerCluster]
  1122 000001D3 0306[2200]              		add	ax, [FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1123 000001D7 1316[2400]              		adc	dx, [FirstSectorH]

  1125 000001DE 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx

  1134                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1135                                  
  1136                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1137                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1138                                  ;
  1139                                  ; NOTES:
  1140                                  ;
  1141                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1142                                  ;
  1143                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1144                                  ;
  1145                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1146                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1147                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1148                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1149                                  ;
  1150                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1151                                  ;
  1152                                  ;   required by msinit
  1153                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1154                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1155                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1156                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1157                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1158                                  ;
  1159                                  ; calls:     none
  1160                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1161                                  ;
  1162                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1163                                  ;
  1164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1165                                  
  1166                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1167                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1168                                  		; ds = cs	
  1169                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1170                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1171                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1172                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1173                                  
  1174 000001E7 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1175 000001EB 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1176 000001EF 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1177 000001F3 A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1178                                  
  1179                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1180                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1181                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1182                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1183                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1184                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1185                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1186                                  		;
  1187                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1188                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1189                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1190                                  		;
  1191                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1192                                  
  1193 000001F6 EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1194                                  
  1195                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1196                                  
  1197                                  ; ReadSectors
  1198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1199                                  ; notES:
  1200                                  ;
  1201                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1202                                  ;
  1203                                  ;
  1204                                  ; INPUT:
  1205                                  ;
  1206                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1207                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1208                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1209                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1210                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1211                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1212                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1213                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1214                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1215                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1216                                  ;
  1217                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1218                                  ;
  1219                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1221                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1222                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1223                                  ;
  1224                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1225                                  ;
  1226                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1227                                  ;
  1228                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1229                                  ;
  1230                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1231                                  ;
  1232                                  ; do the read
  1233                                  ;
  1234                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1235                                  ;
  1236                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1237                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1238                                  ;
  1239                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1241                                  
  1242                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1243                                  ReadSectors:
  1244                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1245                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1246                                  ReadSectors:
  1247 000001FB B90500                  		mov	cx, 5			; 5 retries
  1248                                  
  1249                                  		; Convert a logical sector into track/sector/head. AX has the
  1250                                  		; logical sector number
  1251                                  TryRead:
  1252                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1253                                  		; ds = cs
  1254 000001FE 51                      		push	cx
  1255                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:StartSecL]	; Get starting sector
  1256                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:StartSecH]
  1257                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1258                                  		;mov	ax, [StartSecL]	; *	; Get starting sector
  1259                                  		;mov	dx, [StartSecH]
  1260                                  		;push	ax ; *
  1261                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1262 000001FF A1[0800]                		mov	ax, [StartSecH]
  1263 00000202 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1264                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]
  1265                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1266                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1267 00000204 8B1E[1600]              		mov	bx, [SecPerTrack]
  1268 00000208 F7F3                    		div	bx
  1269                                  
  1270                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1271                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1272                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1273 0000020A 89C5                    		mov	bp, ax ; [TempH]
  1274                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  1275 0000020C A1[0600]                		mov	ax, [StartSecL] ; *
  1276 0000020F F7F3                    		div	bx
  1277                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1278                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]	; [TempH]:ax = track,
  1279                                  						; dx = sector number
  1280                                  
  1281                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerTrack]	; Get number of sectors we can
  1282                                  						; read in this track
  1283 00000211 29D3                    		sub	bx, dx
  1284                                  		;mov	si, bx
  1285 00000213 8B36[0C00]              		mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1286                                  
  1287 00000217 39DE                    		cmp	si, bx
  1288 00000219 7602                    		jna	short GotLength
  1289                                  		;cmp	[SectorCount], si
  1290                                  		;;cmp	[cs:SectorCount], si	; Is possible sectors in track more
  1291                                  		;jnb	short GotLength		; than what we need to read?
  1292 0000021B 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  1293                                  		;mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1294                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:SectorCount]	; Yes, only read what we need to
  1295                                  ;GotLength:
  1296                                  
  1297                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1298                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1299                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1300                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1301                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1302                                  %if 0
  1303                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1304                                  		; dma boundary check for >64KB reads
  1305                                  		; Also, Segment Override risk !
  1306                                  		or	di, di
  1307                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1308                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1309                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1310                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1311                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1312                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1313                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1314                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1315                                  		push	dx
  1316                                  		push	ax
  1317                                  		mov	ax, si
  1318                                  		sub	dx, dx
  1319                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1320                                  		mov	bx, es
  1321                                  		mov	cl, 4
  1322                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1323                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1324                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1325                                  		pop	ax
  1326                                  		pop	dx
  1327                                  		add	bx, di	; add current buffer offset to byte count
  1328                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1329                                  		
  1330                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1331                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!
  1332                                  		dec	si
  1333                                  		jmp	short dma_boundary_chk
  1334                                  dma_boundary_ok:
  1335                                  %endif
  1336                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1337                                  GotLength:
  1338                                  		;inc	dl			; Sector numbers are 1-based
  1339                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1340 0000021D 42                      		inc	dx
  1341 0000021E 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl			; Start sector in BL
  1342                                  		
  1343                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1344                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1345                                  		;mov	dx, [TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1346                                  		;;mov	dx, [cs:TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1347                                  		
  1348 00000220 50                      		push	ax
  1349                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1350                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1351 00000221 89E8                    		mov	ax, bp ; [TempH]
  1352 00000223 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1353                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1354 00000225 F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1355                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; Start cyl in AX, head in dl
  1356                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1357                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1358 00000229 58                      		pop	ax
  1359 0000022A F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1360                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; [TempH]:AX = Cylinder, DX = Head
  1361                                  
  1362                                  			; At this moment, we assume that TempH = 0,
  1363                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1364                                  
  1365 0000022E 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
  1366                                  		
  1367 00000230 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
  1368 00000232 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl			; Shift cyl high bits up
  1369 00000234 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits
  1370 00000236 88C5                    		mov	ch, al			; Setup cyl low
  1371 00000238 88E1                    		mov	cl, ah			; Setup cyl/high - sector
  1372 0000023A 89FB                    		mov	bx, di			; Get back OFFSET
  1373                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1374 0000023C 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive]		; Get drive
  1375                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]	; Get drive
  1376 00000240 89F0                    		mov	ax, si			; Get number of sectors to read (al)
  1377 00000242 B402                    		mov	ah, 2			; Read sectors
  1378                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1379                                  		;push	ax
  1380                                  		;push	di
  1381                                  
  1382                                  			; Issue one read request. ES:BX have the transfer address,
  1383                                  			; AL is the number of sectors.	
  1384                                  
  1385 00000244 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  1386                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  1387                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  1388                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  1389                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1390                                  		;pop	di
  1391                                  		;pop	ax
  1392                                  
  1393                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1394 00000246 B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  1395                                  		
  1396 00000248 59                      		pop	cx		; Get retry count back
  1397 00000249 7307                    		jnc	short ReadOk	; 23/12/2022
  1398                                  		
  1399                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1400                                  		;mov	bx, di		; Get offset
  1401                                  		; ah = 0
  1402                                  		;xor	ah, ah
  1403                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1404                                  		;push	cx
  1405                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1406                                  		;mov	dl, [BootDrive]
  1407                                  		;;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1408                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1409                                  		;push	di
  1410 0000024B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
  1411                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
  1412                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1413                                  		;pop	di
  1414                                  		;pop	cx
  1415 0000024D 49                      		dec	cx
  1416 0000024E 741B                    		jz	short ReadError
  1417 00000250 EBAC                    		jmp	TryRead
  1418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1419                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1420                                  ;ReadError:				
  1421                                  		;jmp	ErrorOut
  1422                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1423                                  
  1424                                  ReadOk:

  1476 0000026B BE[3403]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...

  1478                                  
  1479                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.

  1483 00000273 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY

  1485

  1556                                  
  1557                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1559                                  ;
  1560                                  ; NOTES:
  1561                                  ;
  1562                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1563                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1564                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1565                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1566                                  ;
  1567                                  ; INPUT:
  1568                                  ;
  1569                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1570                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1571                                  ;
  1572                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1573                                  ;
  1574                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1575                                  ;
  1576                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1578                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1579                                  ;
  1580                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1581                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1582                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1583                                  ;     else
  1584                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1585                                  ;
  1586                                  ; else
  1587                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1588                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1589                                  ;     else
  1590                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1591                                  ;
  1592                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1593                                  ;
  1594                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1595                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1596                                  ;
  1597                                  ;	 else
  1598                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1599                                  ;	}
  1600                                  ;    }
  1601                                  ;
  1602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1603                                  
  1604                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1605                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1606                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1607                                  
  1608                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1609 00000293 06                      		push	es
  1610                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1611                                  		; ds = cs
  1612                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1613 00000294 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1614 00000297 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1615                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1616                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1617                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1618                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1619                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1620                                  		; ds = cs
  1621 00000299 C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1622 0000029E A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1623                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1624 000002A1 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx
  1625                                  		; dx = 0
  1626 000002A3 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1627                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1628                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1629 000002A8 7539                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1630                                  Got12Bit:
  1631 000002AA 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1632 000002AC D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1633 000002AE 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1634                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1635 000002B0 56                      		push	si ; (**)
  1636                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1637                                  		;push	dx
  1638                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1639                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1640                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1641 000002B1 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1642                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1643 000002B4 5E                      		pop	si ; (**)
  1644                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1645                                  		;pop	dx
  1646 000002B5 7512                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1647 000002B7 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1648                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1649                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1650                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1651 000002BA 50                      		push	ax ; (*)
  1652 000002BB 46                      		inc	si
  1653                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1654                                  		;push	dx
  1655 000002BC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1656 000002BE E83A00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1657                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1658                                  		;pop	dx
  1659                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1660                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1661                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1662                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1663                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1664                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1665 000002C1 58                      		pop	ax ; (*) 
  1666 000002C2 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1667 000002C7 EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1668                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1669                                  
  1670                                  ClusterOk:				
  1671 000002C9 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1672                                  EvenOdd:	
  1673                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1674                                  		; ds = cs
  1675 000002CC F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1676                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1677                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1678                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1679 000002D1 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1680 000002D3 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1681 000002D6 EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1682                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1683                                  
  1684                                  OddResult:				
  1685 000002D8 B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1686 000002DA D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1687                                  TestEOF:				
  1688 000002DC 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1689 000002DF 7318                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1690 000002E1 EB11                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1691                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1692                                  
  1693                                  Got16Bit:
  1694                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1695                                  		;push	dx
  1696                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1697                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1698                                  		; ax = cluster number
  1699                                  		; dx = 0
  1700                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1701 000002E3 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1702                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1703                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1704 000002E5 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx ; 0
  1705 000002E7 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1706 000002E9 E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1707                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1708                                  		;pop	dx
  1709 000002EC 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1710 000002EF 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1711 000002F2 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1712                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1713                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1714                                  		; ds = cs			
  1715                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1716                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1717 000002F4 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1718                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1719 000002F9 07                      		pop	es
  1720                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1721                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1722                                  ;EndRead:
  1723 000002FA C3                      		retn
  1724                                  
  1725                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1726                                  
  1727                                  ; GetFatSector
  1728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1729                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1730                                  ;
  1731                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1732                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1733                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1734                                  ;
  1735                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1736                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1737                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1738                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1739                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1740                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1741                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1742                                  ;
  1743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1744                                  
  1745                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1746                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1747                                  GetFatSector:
  1748                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1749                                  		;push	ax
  1750                                  		;push	si
  1751 000002FB 57                      		push	di
  1752 000002FC 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1753                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1754                                  		; ds = cs
  1755                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1756                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1757 000002FE F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1758 00000302 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1759                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1760 00000306 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1761 00000308 A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1762                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1763 0000030B 52                      		push	dx
  1764                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1765 0000030C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1766                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1767                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1768                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1769                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1770                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1771                                  		; ds = cs
  1772 0000030E 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1773 00000312 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1774 00000316 A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1775 00000319 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1776                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1777                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1778                                  		
  1779 0000031D C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1	; 1 sector
  1780                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1781 00000323 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1782                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1783 00000325 E8D3FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1784 00000328 5A                      		pop	dx
  1785                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1786                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1787                                  SplitChk:
  1788                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1789 00000329 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]
  1790 0000032D 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1791 0000032E 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1792 00000330 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1793 00000332 5F                      		pop	di
  1794                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1795                                  		;pop	si
  1796                                  		;pop	ax
  1797                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1798                                  ;EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1799 00000333 C3                      		retn
  1800

  1833                                  ;=============================================================================
  1834                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) DATA SEGMENT 
  1835                                  ;=============================================================================
  1836                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  1837                                  
  1838                                  section .BIOSDATA vstart=0
  1839                                  
  1840                                  ;--- DOSBIOS data segment ----------------------------------------------------
  1841                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1842                                  
  1843                                  ;Bios_Data segment
  1844                                  
  1845                                  BData_start:				
  1846 00000000 E96F17                  hdrv_pat:	jmp	init		; MSBIO1.ASM, MSSBDATA.INC
  1847                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1848                                  
  1849 00000003 0000                    DosDataSg:	dw 0
  1850                                  
  1851                                  ; DOS's int 2f handler will exit via a jump through here.
  1852                                  ; This is how the BIOS hooks int2f
  1853                                  			
  1854 00000005 EA                      bios_i2f:	db 0EAh			; far jump to int_2f (segment may not be at 70h)
  1855 00000006 [9108]                  off_706:	dw int_2f
  1856 00000008 7000                    word_708:	dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1857                                  
  1858 0000000A 0000                    romstartaddr:	dw 0			; The start address for the romfind routines
  1859                                  					; This is to maintain binary compatibility
  1860                                  					; with DISK based DOS 5.0
  1861                                  
  1862                                  ; This is a byte used for special key handling in the resident
  1863                                  ; console device driver. It must be here so that it can be included
  1864                                  ; in the WIN386 instance table (in INC\LMSTUB.ASM).
  1865                                  
  1866 0000000C 00                      altah:		db 0			; special key handling
  1867                                  			
  1868 0000000D 00                      inHMA:		db 0			; flag indicates we're running from HMA
  1869 0000000E 00000000                xms:		dd 0			; entry point to xms if above is true
  1870                                  
  1871                                  ; PTRSAV - pointer save
  1872                                  ;
  1873                                  ; This variable holds the pointer to the Request Header passed by a program
  1874                                  ; wishing to use a device driver. When the strategy routine is called it 
  1875                                  ; puts the address of the Request header in this variable and returns.
  1876                                  		
  1877 00000012 00000000                ptrsav:		dd 0			
  1878                                  auxbuf:		;db 4 dup(0)		; set of 1 byte buffers for com 1,2,3, and 4
  1879 00000016 00000000                		db 0, 0, 0, 0 ; 19/10/2022
  1880 0000001A 0000                    zeroseg:	dw 0			; easy way to load segment registers with zero			
  1881 0000001C 0000                    i13_ds:		dw 0			; ds register for int13 call through	
  1882 0000001E 0000                    prevoper:	dw 0			; holds int 13 request (i.e. register ax).			
  1883 00000020 00                      number_of_sec:	db 0			; holds number of secs. to read on an ecc error
  1884 00000021 0000                    auxnum:		dw 0			; which aux device was requested			
  1885

  2012 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  2013 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  2014                                  
  2015                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2016                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  2017                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  2018                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  2019                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  2020                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  2021                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  2022                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  2023                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  2024                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  2025                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  2026                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  2027                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  2028                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  2029                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  2030                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  2031                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  2032                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  2033                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  2034                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  2035                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  2036                                  
  2037 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  2038 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  2039 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  2040                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  2041 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  2042 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  2043 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  2044 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  2045 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  2046                                  
  2047                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2048                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  2049                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  2050                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  2051                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  2052                                  ; algorithm is used:
  2053                                  ;
  2054                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  2055                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  2056                                  ;	set slow = 15
  2057                                  ;   else
  2058                                  ;	set slow = value
  2059                                  ;   ...
  2060                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  2061                                  ;	use slow
  2062                                  ;   else
  2063                                  ;	use fast
  2064                                  ;   ...
  2065                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  2066                                  
  2067 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  2068 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  2069 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  2070 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  2071 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  2072 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  2073 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  2074 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  2075 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  2076 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  2077 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  2078 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  2079 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  2080 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  2081 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  2082 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  2083

  2116                                  ;
  2117                                  ; This buffer is word aligned because certain AMI BIOSs have a bug
  2118                                  ; in them which causes the byte after the buffer to be trashed
  2119                                  ; on floppy reads to odd-byte boundaries. Although no general effort 
  2120                                  ; is made to enforce this in the bigger picture, this one small sacrifice
  2121                                  ; makes that system more-or-less work.

  2136                                  ;	the bpb has not been filled. link also set to -1 to signify end
  2137                                  ;	of list. # of cylinders in maxparms initialized to -1 to indicate
  2138                                  ;	that the parameters have not been set.

  2492                                  ;************************************************************************
  2493                                  ;*									*
  2494                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2495                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2496                                  ;*									*
  2497                                  ;************************************************************************
  2498                                  
  2499                                  strategy:	; proc far		
  2500 000006F5 2E891E[1200]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav], bx ; store es:bx (device driver request packet)
  2501                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2502 000006FA 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2503 000006FF CB                      		retf

  2505                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  2507                                  ;************************************************************************
  2508                                  ;*									*
  2509                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2510                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2511                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2512                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2513                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2514                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2515                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2516                                  ;*									*
  2517                                  ;************************************************************************
  2518                                  
  2519                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2520                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2521                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2522                                  
  2523                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2524                                  
  2525                                  con_entry:				
  2526 00000700 E84000                  		call	cdev_entry
  2527                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2528                                  		;dw 0E4h		; con_table

  2532

  2539 0000070A 0000                    		db 0, 0

  2541
