  3347                                  
  3348                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3349                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3350                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3351                                  
  3352                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3353                                  
  3354                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3355                                  ;
  3356                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3357                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3358                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3359                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3360                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3361                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3362                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3363                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3364                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3365                                  ;
  3366                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3367                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3368                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3369                                  ;
  3370                                  ;	uses:	
  3371                                  ;
  3372                                  ;
  3373                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3374                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3375                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3376                                  ;
  3377                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3378                                  
  3379                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3380                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3381                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3382                                  
  3383                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3384                                  
  3385                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3386                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3387                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3388                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3389                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3390                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3391                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3392                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3393                                  
  3394                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3395                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3396                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3397                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3398                                  
  3399                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3400 000012DC 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3401 000012DF 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3402 000012E1 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3403 000012E4 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3404 000012E6 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3405 000012E9 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3406                                  atd1:
  3407 000012EB 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3408                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3409                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3410                                  
  3411                                  atd2:					
  3412 000012F0 53                      		push	bx
  3413 000012F1 51                      		push	cx
  3414 000012F2 52                      		push	dx
  3415 000012F3 57                      		push	di
  3416 000012F4 1E                      		push	ds
  3417 000012F5 06                      		push	es
  3418 000012F6 50                      		push	ax
  3419 000012F7 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3420                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3421 000012FA 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3422                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3423 000012FC C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3424                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3425                                  					; initially no error code.
  3426 00001301 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3427 00001304 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3428                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3429 00001308 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3430                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3431 0000130A C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3432 0000130F EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3433                                  					; return
  3434                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3435                                  
  3436                                  atd3:					
  3437 00001311 53                      		push	bx
  3438 00001312 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3439 00001314 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3440 00001317 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3441 00001319 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3442 0000131B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3443 0000131C 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3444 0000131F 0E                      		push	cs
  3445 00001320 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3446 00001323 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3447 00001325 58                      		pop	ax
  3448 00001326 50                      		push	ax
  3449 00001327 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3450 0000132A BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3451 0000132D EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3452 0000132E E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3453                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3454                                  
  3455                                  atd4:	
  3456                                  
  3457                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3458                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3459                                  				
  3460 00001331 58                      		pop	ax
  3461                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3462 00001332 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3463 00001336 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3464 00001338 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3465 0000133A F9                      		stc
  3466                                  atd5:					
  3467 0000133B 07                      		pop	es
  3468 0000133C 1F                      		pop	ds
  3469 0000133D 5F                      		pop	di
  3470 0000133E 5A                      		pop	dx
  3471 0000133F 59                      		pop	cx
  3472 00001340 5B                      		pop	bx
  3473 00001341 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3474                                  
  3475                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3476                                  
  3477                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3478                                  ;
  3479                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3480                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3481                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3482                                  ;	
  3483                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3484                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3485                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3486                                  ;
  3487                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3488                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3489                                  ;
  3490                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3491                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3492                                  
  3493                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3494                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3495                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3496 00001344 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3497                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3498 00001347 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3499 0000134C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3500 0000134F 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3501 00001351 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3502                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3503                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3504                                  setc1:					
  3505 00001356 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3506 00001358 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3507                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3508                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3509 0000135A A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3510 0000135D 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3511 00001361 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3512 00001363 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3513                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3514 00001366 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3515 00001369 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3516 0000136B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3517 0000136E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3518 00001371 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3519 00001373 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3520                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3521 00001375 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3522 00001378 06                      		push	es
  3523 00001379 53                      		push	bx
  3524 0000137A 0E                      		push	cs
  3525 0000137B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3526 0000137E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3527                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3528 00001382 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3529                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3530 00001385 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3531                                  					; only use low part
  3532 00001388 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3533                                  					; control byte modifier
  3534 0000138C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3535 0000138D 07                      		pop	es
  3536                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3537 0000138E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3538 00001392 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3539 00001395 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3540                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3541 00001397 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3542 0000139B C3                      		retn
  3543                                  
  3544                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3545                                  
  3546                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3547                                  ;
  3548                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3549                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3550                                  ;
  3551                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3552                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3553                                  ;
  3554                                  ;	
  3555                                  ;
  3556                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3557                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3558                                  ;
  3559                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3560                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3561                                  
  3562                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3563 0000139C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3564 0000139E 0E                      		push	cs
  3565 0000139F E84000                  		call	command
  3566 000013A2 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3567                                  doc1:					
  3568 000013A4 0E                      		push	cs
  3569 000013A5 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3570 000013A8 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3571 000013AA B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3572 000013AD BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3573 000013B0 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3574 000013B1 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3575                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3576                                  
  3577                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3578                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3579                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3580                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3581                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3582                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3583                                  ;
  3584                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3585                                  
  3586                                  rsct_loop:				
  3587 000013B2 6D                      		insw
  3588 000013B3 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3589 000013B5 FB                      		sti
  3590                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3591 000013B6 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3592                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3593                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3594 000013BB 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3595 000013BD 0E                      		push	cs
  3596 000013BE E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3597 000013C1 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3598 000013C3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3599 000013C6 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3600 000013C9 FA                      		cli
  3601 000013CA F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3602 000013CC FB                      		sti
  3603                                  doc2:					
  3604 000013CD 0E                      		push	cs
  3605 000013CE E82900                  		call	check_status
  3606 000013D1 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3607                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3608 000013D3 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3609 000013D7 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3610                                  doc3:					
  3611 000013D9 C3                      		retn
  3612                                  
  3613                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3614                                  
  3615                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3616                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3617                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3618                                  
  3619                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3620                                  
  3621                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3622                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3623                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3624                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3625                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3626                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3627                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3628                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3629                                  
  3630                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3631                                  ;
  3632                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3633                                  ;
  3634                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3635                                  ;
  3636                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3637                                  ;
  3638                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3639                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3640                                  ;	
  3641                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3642                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3643                                  
  3644                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3645                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3646                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3647                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3648 000013DA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3649 000013DD EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3650                                  
  3651                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3652                                  
  3653                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3654                                  ;
  3655                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3656                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3657                                  ;
  3658                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3659                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3660                                  ;
  3661                                  ;
  3662                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3663                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3664                                  ;
  3665                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3666                                  
  3667                                  command:	; proc near		
  3668                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3669                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3670                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3671 000013E2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3672 000013E5 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3673                                  
  3674                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3675                                  
  3676                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3677                                  ;
  3678                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3679                                  ;
  3680                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3681                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3682                                  ;
  3683                                  ;
  3684                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3685                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3686                                  ;		
  3687                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3688                                  
  3689                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3690                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3691                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3692                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3693 000013EA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3694 000013ED EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3695                                  
  3696                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3697                                  
  3698                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3699                                  ;
  3700                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3701                                  ;
  3702                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3703                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3704                                  ;
  3705                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3706                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3707                                  
  3708                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3709                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3710                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3711                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3712 000013F2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3713 000013F5 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3714                                  
  3715                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3716                                  
  3717                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3718                                  ;
  3719                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3720                                  ;
  3721                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3722                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3723                                  ;
  3724                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3725                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3726                                  
  3727                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3728                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3729                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3730                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3731 000013FA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3732 000013FD EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3733                                  
  3734                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3735                                  
  3736                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3737                                  ;
  3738                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3739                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3740                                  ;
  3741                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3742                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3743                                  ;
  3744                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3745                                  
  3746                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3747                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3748                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3749                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3750 00001402 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3751 00001405 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3752                                  
  3753                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3754                                  
  3755                                  endatrom:
  3756                                  
  3757                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3758                                  
  3759                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3760                                  ;;
  3761                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3762                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3763                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3764                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3765                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3766                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3767                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3768                                  
  3769                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3770 0000140A 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3771                                  					;
  3772                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3773                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3774                                  					;
  3775                                  					; warning!!!
  3776                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3777 0000140D 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3778                                  no_hookit:				
  3779                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3780                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3781 0000140F 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3782                                  
  3783                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3784                                  
  3785                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3786 00001414 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3787 00001417 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3788 00001419 1E                      		push	ds
  3789 0000141A 50                      		push	ax
  3790 0000141B B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3791 0000141E 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3792 00001420 58                      		pop	ax
  3793 00001421 9C                      		pushf
  3794                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3795                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3796 00001422 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3797 00001427 1F                      		pop	ds
  3798 00001428 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3799                                  
  3800                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3801                                  
  3802 0000142B 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3803                                  
  3804                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3805                                  
  3806                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3807                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3808                                  
  3809                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3810                                  
  3811                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3812                                  ;
  3813                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3814                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3815                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3816                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3817                                  
  3818                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3819 0000142C 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3820 00001431 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3821                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3822 00001438 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3823 0000143A 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3824 00001440 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3825 00001446 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3826                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3827                                  		
  3828                                  century20:				
  3829 00001448 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3830 0000144E 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3831 00001454 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3832                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3833                                  years:					
  3834 0000145B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3835 0000145D 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3836 00001461 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3837                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3838 00001464 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3839 00001466 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3840 0000146B B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3841 0000146D F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3842 0000146F 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3843 00001474 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3844 00001479 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3845 00001480 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3846 00001482 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3847 00001487 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3848 0000148E B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3849                                  regularyear:				
  3850 00001491 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3851 00001498 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3852 0000149A 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3853 0000149F 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3854 000014A6 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3855                                  					;
  3856                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3857                                  leapyear:				
  3858 000014A8 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3859                                  					; change month table.
  3860                                  yeardone:				
  3861 000014AE 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3862 000014B0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3863 000014B2 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3864                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3865 000014B6 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3866 000014B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3867                                  months:					
  3868 000014BC FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3869                                  
  3870                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3871                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3872                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3873                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3874                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3875                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3876                                  		
  3877 000014BE 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3878 000014C0 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3879                                  					; dh=0
  3880 000014C2 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3881 000014C4 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3882 000014C5 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3883 000014C7 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3884                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3885                                  month_done:				
  3886 000014C9 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3887                                  					; restore month table value
  3888 000014CF 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3889 000014D1 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3890 000014D6 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3891 000014DB 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3892                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3893                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3894 000014E0 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3895 000014E2 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3896                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3897 000014E7 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3898 000014E9 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3899                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3900 000014EE 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3901 000014F0 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3902                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3903 000014F5 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3904 000014F7 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3905 000014FC CB                      		retf
  3906                                  
  3907                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3908                                  
  3909                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3910                                  
  3911                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3912                                  
  3913                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3914                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3915                                  		
  3916 000014FD 51                      		push	cx		
  3917 000014FE D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3918 00001500 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3919 00001502 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3920 00001504 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3921 00001506 59                      		pop	cx
  3922 00001507 CB                      		retf
  3923                                  
  3924                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3925                                  
  3926                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3927                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3928                                  
  3929                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3930                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3931                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3932                                  
  3933                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3934                                  
  3935                                  int6c:					
  3936 00001508 0E                      		push	cs
  3937 00001509 1F                      		pop	ds
  3938 0000150A 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3939 0000150E 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3940 00001512 9D                      		popf
  3941 00001513 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3942 00001516 FA                      		cli
  3943 00001517 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3944 0000151B FB                      		sti
  3945 0000151C E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3946 0000151F FA                      		cli
  3947 00001520 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3948 00001522 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3949                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3950                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3951 00001524 FB                      		sti
  3952                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3953                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3954 00001525 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3955                                  
  3956                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3957                                  
  3958                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3959                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3960                                  
  3961                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3962 00001529 50                      		push	ax
  3963 0000152A 51                      		push	cx
  3964 0000152B 52                      		push	dx
  3965 0000152C 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3966 0000152E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3967                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3968                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3969                                  					; midnight
  3970                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3971 00001530 5A                      		pop	dx
  3972 00001531 59                      		pop	cx
  3973 00001532 58                      		pop	ax
  3974 00001533 50                      		push	ax
  3975 00001534 53                      		push	bx
  3976 00001535 51                      		push	cx
  3977 00001536 52                      		push	dx
  3978 00001537 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  3979                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3980 0000153E B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3981 00001540 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3982                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  3983                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  3984                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  3985                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  3986 00001542 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  3987 00001544 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  3988                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3989                                  
  3990                                  read_ok:				
  3991 00001547 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  3992 0000154B 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  3993 0000154F 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  3994 00001553 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  3995 00001557 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  3996 0000155E E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  3997 00001561 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  3998 00001563 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  3999 0000156A E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  4000 0000156D 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4001 0000156F 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4002 00001576 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  4003 00001579 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4004 0000157C 98                      		cbw
  4005 0000157D 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4006 00001582 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4007 00001584 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4008                                  
  4009                                  century_19:				
  4010 00001587 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4011 0000158A B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4012 0000158C F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4013 0000158E 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4014 00001590 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4015 00001591 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4016                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4017 00001594 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4018 00001596 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4019 0000159A 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4020 0000159C 98                      		cbw
  4021 0000159D 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4022 0000159F 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  4023 000015A1 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4024 000015A4 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4025 000015A6 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4026 000015AB EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4027                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4028                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4029                                  
  4030                                  leap_year:				
  4031 000015AD 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4032 000015B2 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4033                                  leap_adjustment:			
  4034 000015B4 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4035                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4036 000015B9 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4037 000015BD 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4038 000015BF 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4039 000015C0 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4040 000015C5 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4041 000015C9 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4042 000015CB 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4043 000015CC D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4044 000015CE BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  4045 000015D1 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  4046                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4047                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4048                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4049                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4050                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4051 000015D3 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4052                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  4053 000015D5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4054                                  r_d_ret:				
  4055 000015DA 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4056 000015DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  4057 000015E0 59                      		pop	cx
  4058 000015E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  4059 000015E2 58                      		pop	ax
  4060 000015E3 C3                      		retn
  4061                                  
  4062                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4063                                  
  4064                                  r_t_retj:				
  4065 000015E4 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4066 000015E6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4067 000015E8 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4068                                  
  4069                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4070                                  
  4071                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4072                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4073                                  
  4074                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4075 000015EA B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4076 000015EC CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4077                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4078                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4079                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4080 000015EE 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4081 000015F0 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4082 000015F4 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4083 000015F8 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4084 000015FC C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4085 00001601 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4086 00001604 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4087 00001606 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4088 00001609 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4089 0000160B E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4090 0000160E 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4091 00001612 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4092 00001616 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4093 0000161A 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4094                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4095                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4096                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4097 0000161E FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4098                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4099                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4100                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4101                                  r_t_ret:				
  4102 00001622 C3                      		retn
  4103                                  
  4104                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4105                                  
  4106                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4107                                  
  4108                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  4109 00001623 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4110 00001626 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4111 00001629 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4112 0000162C A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4113 0000162F E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4114 00001632 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4115 00001635 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4116 00001638 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4117 0000163B A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4118 0000163E A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4119 00001641 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4120 00001644 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4121 00001647 C3                      		retn
  4122                                  
  4123                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4124                                  
  4125                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4126                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4127                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4128                                  
  4129                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4130 00001648 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4131 0000164A 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4132 0000164C B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4133 0000164E D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4134 00001650 D50A                    		aad
  4135 00001652 C3                      		retn
  4136                                  
  4137                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4138                                  
  4139                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4140                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4141                                  
  4142                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4143 00001653 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4144 00001658 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4145 0000165A 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4146 0000165C 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4147                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4148                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4149 00001661 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4150 00001663 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4151                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4152                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4153 00001668 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4154                                  century_20:				
  4155 0000166A 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4156 0000166F 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4157 00001671 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4158 00001676 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4159 00001678 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4160                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4161 0000167D 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4162 0000167F 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4163 00001684 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4164                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4165                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4166                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4167                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4168                                  		; cf=0
  4169                                  		;clc
  4170                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4171 00001686 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4172 0000168B C3                      		retn
  4173                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4174                                  
  4175                                  date_error:				
  4176 0000168C F9                      		stc
  4177                                  date_err2:
  4178 0000168D C3                      		retn
  4179                                  
  4180                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4181                                  
  4182                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4183                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4184                                  
  4185                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4186 0000168E 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4187 00001693 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4188 00001695 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4189 0000169A 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4190                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4191                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4192                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4193                                  		;clc
  4194                                  		;retn
  4195                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4196 0000169C 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4197                                  time_error:
  4198                                  bv_error:	
  4199 000016A1 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4200 000016A2 C3                      		retn
  4201                                  
  4202                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4203                                  
  4204                                  ;time_error:				
  4205                                  		;stc
  4206                                  		;retn
  4207                                  
  4208                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4209                                  
  4210                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4211                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4212                                  
  4213                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4214 000016A3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4215 000016A6 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4216                                  bv_loop:				
  4217 000016A9 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4218 000016AB 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4219 000016AD 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4220                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4221 000016B0 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4222 000016B2 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4223 000016B4 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4224 000016B6 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4225 000016B8 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4226 000016BA D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4227 000016BC 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4228 000016BF 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4229 000016C2 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4230 000016C4 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4231 000016C5 49                      		dec	cx
  4232 000016C6 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4233 000016C8 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4234 000016C9 C3                      		retn
  4235                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4236                                  
  4237                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4238                                  ;bv_error:				
  4239                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4240                                  		;retn
  4241                                  
  4242                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4243                                  
  4244                                  endk09:

  4246                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4247                                  
  4248                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4249                                  ;									:
  4250                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4251                                  ;									:
  4252                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4253                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4254                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4255                                  ;									:
  4256                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4257                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4258                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4259                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4260                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4261                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4262                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4263                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4264                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4265                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4266                                  ;		this program.						:
  4267                                  ;									:
  4268                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4269                                  
  4270                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4271                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4272                                  
  4273                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4274                                  
  4275                                  ; 22/12/2022
  4276                                  align 2
  4277                                  		;db 90h
  4278                                  
  4279 000016CA 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  4280 000016CC 0000                    bios_l:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  4281 000016CE 0000                    bios_h:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  4282 000016D0 0000                    doscnt:		dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  4283 000016D2 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  4284 000016D3 0000                    fatloc:		dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  4285 000016D5 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  4286 000016D7 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4287 000016D8 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4288 000016DA 0000                    temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4289 000016DC FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4290                                  
  4291                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  4292                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.
  4293                                  
  4294 000016DE 02                      num_heads:	db 2			; number of heads returned by rom
  4295 000016DF 09                      sec_trk:	db 9			; sec/trk returned by rom
  4296 000016E0 28                      num_cyln:	db 40			; number of cylinders returned by rom
  4297 000016E1 00                      fakefloppydrv:	db 0			; if 1,	then no	diskette drives	in the system.

  4375                                  BPB48T:
  4376                                  ;bpb48t:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 112, 720, 0FDh, 2, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4377                                  		; 48 tpi diskettes	;
  4378                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4379                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4380                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4381                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4382                                  		dw	112		; number of directory entries
  4383                                  		dw	720 ; 2*9*40	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4384                                  		db	0FDh		; media descriptor
  4385                                  		dw	2		; number of fat sectors
  4386                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4387                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4388                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4389                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4390                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4391                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)					
  4392                                  
  4393                                  		db 90h
  4394                                  ;align 2

  4409                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)

  4445                                  ;		dw	2880 ; 2*18*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4446                                  ;		db	0F0h		; media descriptor
  4447                                  ;		dw	9		; number of fat sectors
  4448                                  ;		dw	18		; sectors per track
  4449                                  ;		dw	2		; heads
  4450                                  ;		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4451                                  ;		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4452                                  ;		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4453                                  ;		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4454                                  ;
  4455                                  ;		db 90h
  4456                                  ;align 2
  4457                                  
  4458                                  BPB288:
  4459                                  ;bpb288:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 240, 5760, 0F0h, 9, 36, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0>
  4460                                  		; 3.5" diskettes - 2.88 MB ;	 
  4461                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4462                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4463                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4464                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4465                                  		dw	240		; number of directory entries
  4466                                  		dw	5760 ; 2*36*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4467                                  		db	0F0h		; media descriptor
  4468                                  		dw	3		; number of fat sectors
  4469                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4470                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4471                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4472                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4473                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4474                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4475                                  
  4476                                  		db 90h			;
  4477                                  ;align 2
  4478                                  
  4479                                  %endif
  4480                                  
  4481                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4482                                  					; align	2
  4483                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4484                                  %if 0
  4485                                  bpbtable:	dw bpb48t		; 48tpi	drives
  4486                                  		dw bpb96t		; 96tpi	drives
  4487                                  		dw bpb35		; 3.5" drives
  4488                                  		dw bpb35		; unused 8" diskette
  4489                                  		dw bpb35		; unused 8" diskette

  4491                                  		dw bpb35		; used for tape	drive
  4492                                  		dw bpb35		; FFOTHER
  4493                                  		dw bpb35		; ERIMO
  4494                                  		dw bpb288		; 2.88MB drive
  4495                                  		;

  4497                                  %endif
  4498                                  
  4499                                  ; 13/12/2022
  4500                                  %if 0
  4501                                  BPBTABLE:	dw BPB48T		; 48tpi	drives
  4502                                  		dw BPB96T		; 96tpi	drives
  4503                                  		dw BPB35		; 3.5" drives
  4504                                  		dw BPB35		; unused 8" diskette
  4505                                  		dw BPB35		; unused 8" diskette
  4506                                  		dw BPB35		; used for hard	disk

  4509                                  		dw BPB35		; ERIMO
  4510                                  		dw BPB288		; 2.88MB drive

  4513
