  7296                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7297                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7298                                  
  7299                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7300                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7301                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7302                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7303                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7304                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7305                                  ;
  7306                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7307                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7308                                  
  7309                                  
  7310                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7311 00002198 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7312                                  fmpnext:				
  7313 0000219C 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7314 000021A0 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7315 000021A2 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7316 000021A5 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7317 000021A9 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7318                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7319                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7320                                  fmpnextfound:
  7321 000021AB C3                      		retn
  7322                                  
  7323                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7324                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7325                                  ;fmpret:
  7326                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7327                                  
  7328                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7329                                  
  7330                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7331                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.
  7332 000021AC E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7333 000021AF 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7334 000021B1 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  7335 000021B5 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7336                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7337 000021BA 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7338                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7339                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7340 000021BE C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7341                                  					; ffHardFile
  7342 000021C2 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7343 000021C7 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7344 000021CA 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7345 000021CD A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7346 000021D0 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7347 000021D3 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7348 000021D6 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7349                                  					; set physical number
  7350 000021D9 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7351 000021DC 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7352                                  					; set logical number
  7353 000021DF 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7354 000021E4 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7355 000021E6 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7356                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7357 000021EB 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7358                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7359                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7360 000021ED 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7361 000021F0 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7362 000021F4 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7363 000021F7 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7364 000021F9 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7365 000021FB 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7366 000021FF 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7367                                  					; set hidden trks
  7368 00002202 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7369 00002206 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7370 0000220A 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7371 0000220E BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7372 00002211 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7373 00002214 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7374                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7375                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7376                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7377 00002216 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7378 00002218 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7379 0000221B 06                      		push	es
  7380 0000221C E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7381                                  					; bx value saved.
  7382 0000221F 07                      		pop	es
  7383 00002220 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7384 00002222 E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7385                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7386 00002225 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7387                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7389

  7392                                  		;retn

  7431                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7432                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7433                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7434                                  ;
  7435                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7436                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7437                                  ;			trash ax
  7438                                  
  7439                                  dmax_check:	
  7440 00002250 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7441 00002255 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7442 00002257 06                      		push	es
  7443                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7444 00002258 B85104                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022

  7449                                  					; set message flag

  7454                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG

  7456                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7457                                  					; set message flag

  7460                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1

  7463                                  
  7464                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7465                                  
  7466                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7467                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7468                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7469                                  ;								 
  7470                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7471                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7472                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7473                                  
  7474                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7475 00002265 56                      		push	si
  7476 00002266 53                      		push	bx
  7477 00002267 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7478                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7479 0000226B 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7480 0000226E 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7481                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7482 00002270 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7483 00002272 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7485                                  
  7486                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7487                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7488 00002274 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7489                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7490 00002276 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7491                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7492 00002279 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7493                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7494 0000227D 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7495                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7496                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7497 00002280 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7498 00002283 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7499 00002287 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7500 00002289 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7501 0000228E FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7502 00002292 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7503 00002297 5B                      		pop	bx
  7504 00002298 5E                      		pop	si
  7505 00002299 C3                      		retn
  7506                                  
  7507                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7508                                  
  7509                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7510                                  ; 15/10/2022

  7512                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

  7515                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7516 0000229A 50                      		push	ax
  7517 0000229B 51                      		push	cx
  7518 0000229C 52                      		push	dx
  7519 0000229D 55                      		push	bp
  7520 0000229E 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7521                                  loop_clock:
  7522 000022A0 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7523 000022A2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7524 000022A4 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7525 000022A6 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7526                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7527                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7528                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7529 000022A8 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7530 000022AB 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7531 000022AD 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7532 000022B0 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7533 000022B2 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7534 000022B5 741B                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7535 000022B7 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7536 000022B8 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7537                                  delay:
  7538 000022BB E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7539 000022BD EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7541                                  
  7542                                  clock_present:
  7543                                  		;mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7544                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7545                                  		; ds = cs
  7546 000022BF C606[F304]01            		mov	byte [havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7547                                  		
  7548 000022C4 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7549                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7550                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7551 000022C7 56                      		push	si
  7552 000022C8 E85EF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7553 000022CB FA                      		cli
  7554                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7555 000022CC 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7556 000022D0 FB                      		sti
  7557 000022D1 5E                      		pop	si
  7558                                  no_readdate:
  7559 000022D2 5D                      		pop	bp
  7560 000022D3 5A                      		pop	dx
  7561 000022D4 59                      		pop	cx
  7562 000022D5 58                      		pop	ax
  7563                                  cmosck9:	; 19/12/2023
  7564 000022D6 C3                      		retn
  7565                                  
  7566                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7567                                  
  7568                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7569                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7570                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7571                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7572                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7573                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7574                                  ;
  7575                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7576                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7577                                  ;
  7578                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7579                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7580                                  ;
  7581                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7582                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7583                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initialization routine
  7584                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7585                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7586                                  ;
  7587                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7588                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7589                                  
  7590                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7591                                  
  7592                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7593                                  
  7594                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7595                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7596                                  		
  7597                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7598                                  		; ds = cs
  7599                                  		;push	ax ; not necessary ; 19/12/2023
  7600                                  		;
  7601 000022D7 803E[3E06]FC            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0FCh
  7602                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7603 000022DC 75F8                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7604 000022DE 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7605                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7606                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7607 000022E4 7407                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  7608 000022E6 803E[3F06]04            		cmp	byte [secondary_model_byte], 4
  7609                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7610                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7611 000022EB 73E9                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  7612                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  7613                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7614                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  7615                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  7616                                  cmosck4:				
  7617 000022ED B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7618                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7619 000022EF B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7620                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7621 000022F1 E80B00                  		call	cmos_write
  7622 000022F4 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7623                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7624 000022F6 E82000                  		call	cmos_read
  7625 000022F9 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7626                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7627 000022FB 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7628 000022FD B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7629                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7630                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7631                                  		;call	cmos_write
  7632                                  ;cmosck9:
  7633                                  		;pop	ax ; 19/12/2023
  7634                                  		;retn
  7635                                  
  7636                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7637                                  		;jmp	short cmos_write
  7638                                  
  7639                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7640                                  
  7641                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7642                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7643                                  ;									       :
  7644                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7645                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7646                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7647                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7648                                  ;									       :
  7649                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7650                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7651                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7652                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7653                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7654                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7655                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7656                                  
  7657                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7658 000022FF 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7659 00002300 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7660 00002301 FA                      		cli
  7661 00002302 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7662 00002303 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7663 00002305 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7664                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7665 00002307 90                      		nop
  7666 00002308 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7667 0000230A E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7668 0000230C 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7669 0000230D 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7670 0000230F 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7671 00002311 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7672                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7673 00002313 90                      		nop
  7674 00002314 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7675 00002316 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7676                                  
  7677                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7678                                  		;push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7679                                  		;call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7680                                  		;retn
  7681 00002317 EB1A                    		jmp	short cmos_rw_popf
  7682                                  
  7683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7684                                  
  7685                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7686                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7687                                  ;									       :
  7688                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7689                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7690                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7691                                  ;									       :
  7692                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7693                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled. during the cmos read both nmi and   :
  7694                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7695                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7696                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7697                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7698                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7699                                  
  7700                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7701 00002319 9C                      		pushf
  7702 0000231A FA                      		cli
  7703 0000231B 53                      		push	bx
  7704 0000231C 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7705 0000231D 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7706 0000231F E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7707                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7708 00002321 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7709 00002322 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7710 00002324 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7711 00002326 58                      		pop	ax
  7712 00002327 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7713 00002329 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7714 0000232B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7715                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7716 0000232D 90                      		nop
  7717 0000232E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7718 00002330 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7719 00002332 5B                      		pop	bx
  7720                                  		
  7721                                  		; 19/12/2023
  7722                                  cmos_rw_popf:
  7723 00002333 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7724 00002334 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7725 00002337 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7726                                  
  7727                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7728                                  
  7729                                  cmos_popf:				
  7730 00002338 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7731                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7732                                  
  7733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7734                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7736                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7738                                  
  7739                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7740                                  ;
  7741                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7742                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7743                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7744                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7745                                  
  7746                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7747                                  
  7748                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7749                                  ;
  7750                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7751                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7752                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7753                                  
  7754                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7755                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7756                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7757                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7758                                  
  7759                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7760                                  getclus:
  7761                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7762                                  		; ds = cs
  7763                                  
  7764 00002339 51                      		push	cx
  7765 0000233A 57                      		push	di
  7766                                  		;mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7767 0000233B 890E[D016]              		mov	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023
  7768 0000233F 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7769 00002341 48                      		dec	ax
  7770 00002342 48                      		dec	ax
  7771 00002343 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7772                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7773                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7774                                  		;add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7775                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7776                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7777 00002345 0306[CC16]              		add	ax, [bios_l]
  7778 00002349 1316[CE16]              		adc	dx, [bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7779                                  unpack:
  7780 0000234D 1E                      		push	ds ; ds = cs ; 13/12/2023
  7781 0000234E 52                      		push	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  7782 0000234F 50                      		push	ax
  7783 00002350 53                      		push	bx
  7784                                  		;mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7785 00002351 8B36[D316]              		mov	si, [fatloc] ; 13/12/2023
  7786 00002355 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7787 00002357 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7788 00002359 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7789                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7790 0000235F 752F                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7791 00002361 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7792                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7793 00002363 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7794                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7795                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  7796 00002365 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7797                                  		; 12/12/2023
  7798                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  7799 00002367 E86500                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7800                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
  7801                                  
  7802 0000236A 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7803 0000236C 750C                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7804                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7805                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7806                                  
  7807                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7808                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7809 0000236E 50                      		push	ax ; **	; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  7810                                  
  7811 0000236F 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7812                                  
  7813                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  7814 00002370 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7815 00002372 E85A00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7816                                  		;pop	dx ; 13/12/2023
  7817                                  
  7818                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7819                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7820                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  7821                                  		;mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7822                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7823                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7824                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7825                                  		;mov	al, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7826 00002375 58                      		pop	ax  ; ** ; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  7827 00002376 8A260000                		mov	ah, [0] ; high 4 bits (bits 7 to 11) of 12 bits cluster num
  7828                                  even_odd:
  7829 0000237A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7830 0000237B 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7831 0000237C D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7832 0000237E 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7833 00002380 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7834                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7835 00002382 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7836 00002384 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7837 00002386 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7838                                  havclus:
  7839 00002388 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7840 0000238A 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7841 0000238E EB0B                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7843                                  
  7844                                  unpack16:
  7845                                  		;push	dx	; 13/12/2023	
  7846 00002390 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
  7847 00002392 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7848                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  7849                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7850 00002394 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  7851                                  
  7852                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7853                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  7854 00002396 E83600                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7855                                  		;pop	dx	; 13/12/2023
  7856 00002399 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7857                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7858                                  unpackx:
  7859 0000239B 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7860 0000239C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7861 0000239D 5A                      		pop	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  7862 0000239E 1F                      		pop	ds
  7863                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7864                                  		; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
  7865                                  		; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
  7866                                  		; ds = cs
  7867 0000239F 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7868 000023A1 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart? (consequtive?)
  7869                                  					; (current = previous+1)
  7870 000023A4 7506                    		jnz	short getcl2	; no, read [doscnt] sectors 
  7871                                  		;add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7872 000023A6 010E[D016]              		add	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023 ; add to read count
  7873 000023AA EBA1                    		jmp	short unpack
  7874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7875                                  
  7876                                  getcl2:
  7877 000023AC 53                      		push	bx
  7878 000023AD 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7879 000023AE 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7880                                  
  7881                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7882                                  		; ds = cs
  7883                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7884                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7885 000023AF A1[CA16]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7886 000023B2 8B0E[D016]              		mov	cx, [doscnt]
  7887                                  
  7888 000023B6 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7889                                  		;pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7890                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7891 000023B7 8F06[2B05]              		pop	word [start_sec_h]
  7892                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7893                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7894                                  		; ds = cs
  7895                                  		;push	ds
  7896                                  		;push	cs
  7897                                  		;pop	ds
  7898                                  
  7899 000023BB 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7900                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7901 000023BC BD[C208]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7902                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7903                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7904 000023BF E8A3F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7905                                  		
  7906                                  		;pop	ds
  7907                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7908                                  		; ds = cs
  7909 000023C2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7910 000023C3 5F                      		pop	di
  7911                                  
  7912                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7913                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7914 000023C4 A1[D016]                		mov	ax, [doscnt]
  7915 000023C7 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7916 000023C9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7917 000023CB 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7918 000023CD 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7919 000023CE C3                      		retn
  7920                                  
  7921                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7922                                  
  7923                                  
  7924                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7925                                  ;
  7926                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7927                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7928                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7929                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7930                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7931                                  ;
  7932                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7933                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7934                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7935                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7936                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7937                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7938                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7939                                  
  7940                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7941                                  get_fat_sector:
  7942                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7943                                  		; ds = fat buffer segment
  7944                                  
  7945                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7946                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
  7947 000023CF 51                      		push	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  7948 000023D0 57                      		push	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  7949 000023D1 56                      		push	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  7950 000023D2 06                      		push	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  7951 000023D3 1E                      		push	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  7952                                  
  7953                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7954 000023D4 0E                      		push	cs
  7955 000023D5 1F                      		pop	ds
  7956                                  
  7957 000023D6 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7958                                  		;;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7959                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7960                                  		;mov	cx, [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7961                                  		;div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7962                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7963                                  		;nop
  7964                                  
  7965                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7966 000023D8 F736[D816]              		div	word [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7967                                  
  7968                                  		; ax = FAT sector (sequence/index) number
  7969                                  		; dx = cluster number offset
  7970                                  
  7971                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7972                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7973                                  
  7974                                  		; 13/12/2023 ; *
  7975                                  		;push	es ; *
  7976                                  		;push	ds ; *
  7977                                  		;push	di ; *
  7978 000023DC 50                      		push	ax
  7979                                  		;push	cs ; *
  7980                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  7981                                  
  7982                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7983                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7984 000023DD A1[CA16]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id 
  7985 000023E0 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7986                                  		;;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7987                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7988 000023E3 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7989 000023E4 E87EF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7990 000023E7 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7991 000023E8 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7992                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7993                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7994                                  		;pop	di ; *
  7995                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  7996                                  		;pop	es ; *
  7997                                  
  7998                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7999                                  		; ds = cs
  8000 000023EC 3B06[DC16]              		cmp	ax, [last_fat_sec_num]
  8001                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8002 000023F0 741C                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8003 000023F2 A3[DC16]                		mov	[last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8004                                  		;mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8005                                  					; sector number
  8006                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8007                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8008 000023F5 07                      		pop	es ; FAT buffer segment (DS on top of the stack)
  8009 000023F6 06                      		push	es ; (put it on top of the stack again)
  8010                                  
  8011 000023F7 52                      		push	dx ; cluster number offset
  8012                                  
  8013                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8014 000023F8 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  8015 000023FA 890E[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], cx ;0 
  8016                                  		;mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8017                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8018                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8019 000023FE 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8020                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8021 00002400 41                      		inc	cx ; cx = 1
  8022                                  		;mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8023                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8024 00002401 A1[CA16]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]
  8025                                  		;push	ds
  8026                                  		;pop	es
  8027                                  
  8028 00002404 31FF                    		xor	di, di	; 0	; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8029                                  		
  8030                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8031                                  		;push	ds
  8032                                  		;push	cs
  8033                                  		;pop	ds
  8034                                  		
  8035 00002406 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8036 00002407 BD[C208]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8037                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8038                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8039 0000240A E858F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8040                                  
  8041                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8042                                  		;pop	ds
  8043                                  		; ds = cs = biosdata segment
  8044                                  
  8045 0000240D 5A                      		pop	dx ; cluster number offset 
  8046                                  
  8047                                  gfs_split_chk:
  8048                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8049                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8050 0000240E 8B0E[D816]              		mov	cx, [md_sectorsize]
  8051                                  ;gfs_split_chk:
  8052 00002412 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8053 00002413 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8054                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8055                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8056 00002415 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8057                                  		
  8058                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8059                                  		; bx = dx = cluster number offset in the FAT buffer
  8060 00002417 1F                      		pop	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8061 00002418 07                      		pop	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8062 00002419 5E                      		pop	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8063 0000241A 5F                      		pop	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8064 0000241B 59                      		pop	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8065                                  		;pop	ax
  8066                                  
  8067 0000241C C3                      		retn
  8068                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8069                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends

  8077                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)

  8079                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8080 0000241D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8081                                  %endif
  8082                                  
  8083                                  ;align 16
  8084                                  
  8085                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8086                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8087                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8090                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8100

  8102

  8104

  8111                                  
  8112                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8113 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8114 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8115                                  
  8116                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8117                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8118                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8119                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8120                                  
  8121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8122                                  
  8123                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8124                                  
  8125                                  ;************************************************************************
  8126                                  ;*									*
  8127                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8128                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8129                                  ;*									*
  8130                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8131                                  ;*									*
  8132                                  ;************************************************************************
  8133                                  
  8134                                  _seg_reinit:
  8135 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8136                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8137                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8138 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8139 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8140                                  
  8141                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  8142 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8143 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8144 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8145 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8146 00000042 CB                      		retf
  8147                                  
  8148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8149                                  
  8150                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8151                                  
  8152                                  ;************************************************************************
  8153                                  ;*									*
  8154                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8155                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8156                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8157                                  ;*									*
  8158                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8159                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8160                                  ;*									*
  8161                                  ;************************************************************************
  8162                                  
  8163                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8164 00000043 56                      		push	si
  8165 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  8166 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  8167 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  8168 00000047 57                      		push	di
  8169 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  8170 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  8171 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  8172 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  8173 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8174 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8175                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8176                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8177 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8178 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8179 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8180 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8181 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8182 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8183 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8184 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8185 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8186 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8187                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8188 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8189                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8190                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8191 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8192                                  
  8193                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8194                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8195                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8196                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8197                                  ;
  8198                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8199                                  ;
  8200                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8201                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8202                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8203                                  ;
  8204                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8205                                  
  8206                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8207 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8208 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8209 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8210 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8211                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8212                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8213 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8214 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8215                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8216                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8217 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8218 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8219 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8220 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8221 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8222 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8223 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8224 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8225 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8226 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8227                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8228 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8229                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8230 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8231 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8232                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8233                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8234                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8235                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8236 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8237                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8238 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8239 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8240                                  					; mark operation complete
  8241 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8242 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8243 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8244 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8245 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8246 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8247 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8248 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8249 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8250 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8251                                  	
  8252                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8254                                  bc_retf:
  8255 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8256                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8257                                  
  8258                                  command_error:				
  8259 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8260 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8261                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8262                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8263                                  
  8264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8265                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8266                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8267                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8268                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8269                                  ; high.
  8270                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8271                                  
  8272                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8273                                  
  8274                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8275                                  
  8276 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8277                                  
  8278 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8279                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8280                                  		
  8281                                  
  8282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8283                                  
  8284                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8285                                  
  8286                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8287 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8288                                  					; unknown command error
  8289                                  
  8290                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8291                                  
  8292                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8293                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8294                                  
  8295                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8296                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8297                                  
  8298                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8299                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8300                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8301 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8302 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8303                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8304 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8305 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8306 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8307                                  
  8308                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8309                                  
  8310                                  ;Bios_Code ends

  8313                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8314                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8315                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8316                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

  8319                                  
  8320                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8321                                  
  8322                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8323                                  
  8324                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8325                                  
  8326                                  ;************************************************************************
  8327                                  ;*									*
  8328                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8329                                  ;*									*
  8330                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8331                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8332                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8333                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8334                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8335                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8336                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8337                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8338                                  ;*									*
  8339                                  ;************************************************************************
  8340                                  
  8341                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8342                                  		;db 0
  8343                                  
  8344                                  		; 13/12/202
  8345 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8346                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8347 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8348                                  					; 00 init
  8349 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8350 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8351 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8352                                  					; 03
  8353 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8354                                  					; 04
  8355 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8356                                  					; 05
  8357 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8358 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8359                                  					; 07
  8360 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8361                                  					; 08
  8362 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8363 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8364                                  con_table_end:
  8365 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8366                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8367 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8368 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8369 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8370 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8371 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8372                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8373 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8374                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8375 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8376 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8377 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8378 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8379 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8380 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8381 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8382 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8383 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8384 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8385 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8386 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8387 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8388 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8389 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8390 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8391 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8392 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8393 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8394 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8395                                  prn_table_end:
  8396 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8397                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8398 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8399 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8400 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8401 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8402 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8403 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8404 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8405 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8406 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8407 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8408 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8409                                  aux_table_end:
  8410 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8411                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8412 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8413 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8414 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02

  8417 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8418 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06

  8421 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
