 14543                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14544 00001763 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14545 00001765 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14545 0000176E 736B6574746520666F-
 14545 00001777 7220647269766520   
 14546                                  
 14547                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14548 0000177F 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14548 00001788 65737320616E79206B-
 14548 00001791 6579207768656E2072-
 14548 0000179A 656164790D0A       
 14549 000017A0 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14550                                  
 14551                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14552                                  
 14553                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14554                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14555                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14556                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14557                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14558                                  
 14559                                  chkopcnt:		
 14560 000017A2 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14561 000017A7 C3                      		retn
 14562                                  
 14563                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14564                                  
 14565                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14566                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14567                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14568                                  ;
 14569                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14570                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14571                                  
 14572                                  mediacheck:	
 14573 000017A8 E88EF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14574 000017AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14575 000017AD E85501                  		call	haschange
 14576 000017B0 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14577 000017B2 E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14578 000017B5 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14579 000017B7 50                      		push	ax
 14580 000017B8 52                      		push	dx
 14581 000017B9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14582                                  					; set logical drive number
 14583 000017BD B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14584 000017BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14585                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14586                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14587 000017C1 5A                      		pop	dx
 14588 000017C2 58                      		pop	ax
 14589 000017C3 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14590 000017C5 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14591                                  
 14592                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14593                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14594                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14595                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14596                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14597                                  ; status.
 14598                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14599 000017C8 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14600 000017CC 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14601                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14602                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14603                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14604                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14605 000017D0 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14606                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14607                                  
 14608                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14609                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14610                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14611                                  
 14612 000017D2 50                      		push	ax
 14613 000017D3 51                      		push	cx
 14614 000017D4 52                      		push	dx
 14615 000017D5 E87BED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14616 000017D8 5A                      		pop	dx
 14617 000017D9 59                      		pop	cx
 14618 000017DA 58                      		pop	ax
 14619 000017DB 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14620 000017DD 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14621                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14622 000017DF 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14623                                  mediaret:				
 14624 000017E1 C3                      		retn
 14625                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14626                                  
 14627                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14628                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14629                                  ; or write.
 14630                                  
 14631                                  mediadovolid:				
 14632 000017E2 E813EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14633 000017E5 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14634 000017E7 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14635 000017EA 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14636 000017EC E9DCF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14638                                  
 14639                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14640                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14641                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14642                                  ; dos.
 14643                                  ;
 14644                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14645                                  
 14646                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14647                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14648                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14649                                  
 14650                                  checklatchio:	
 14651                                  
 14652                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14653                                  			
 14654 000017EF E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14655 000017F2 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14656                                  
 14657                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14658                                  
 14659 000017F4 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14660 000017F7 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14661                                  
 14662                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14663                                  ; expensive verification.
 14664                                  
 14665 000017F9 E8FCED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14666 000017FC 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14667 000017FE E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14668 00001801 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14669 00001803 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14670 00001805 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14671 00001807 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14672                                  checklatchret:				
 14673 0000180A E8BEF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14674                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14675 0000180D F9                      		stc
 14676 0000180E 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14677                                  checkret:				
 14678 0000180F C3                      		retn
 14679                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14680                                  
 14681                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14682                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14683                                  ;
 14684                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14685                                  
 14686                                  checkfatvid:				
 14687 00001810 E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14688 00001813 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14689 00001815 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14690                                  
 14691                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14692                                  
 14693                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14694                                  
 14695                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14696                                  
 14697                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14698                                  ;
 14699                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14700                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14701                                  ;
 14702                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14703                                  ;
 14704                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14705                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14706                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14707                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14708                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14709                                  ;
 14710                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14711                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14712                                  ; routine.)
 14713                                  ;
 14714                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14715                                  
 14716                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14717                                  check_vid:
 14718                                  
 14719                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14720                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14721                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14722                                  
 14723 00001817 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14724                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14725                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14726 0000181C 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14727 0000181E E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14728 00001821 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14729 00001823 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14730 00001825 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14731                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14732 0000182A 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14733                                  					; if not fat system
 14734 0000182C E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14735 0000182F 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14736 00001831 E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14737 00001834 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14738                                  					; definitely changed
 14739 00001837 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14740                                  
 14741 00001839 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14742                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14743 0000183A E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14744                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14745                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14746                                  		;clc
 14747                                  checkfatret:				
 14748 0000183D C3                      		retn
 14749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14750                                  
 14751                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14752                                  changed_drv:
 14753 0000183E F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14754 0000183F C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14755                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14756 00001844 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14757                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14758                                  
 14759                                  ; extended id check
 14760                                  
 14761                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14762                                  
 14763                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14764                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14765                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14766                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14767                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14768                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14769                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14770                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14771                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14772                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14773                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14774                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14775                                  ;
 14776                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14777                                  
 14778                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14779                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14780 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 14781                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14782                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14783 00001846 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14784 00001849 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14785 0000184D 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14786 0000184F A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14787 00001852 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14788 00001856 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14789 00001858 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14790                                  					; don't know
 14791 0000185A 58                      		pop	ax
 14792 0000185B EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14793                                  					; reset the flag
 14794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14795                                  
 14796                                  ext_changed:				
 14797 0000185D 58                      		pop	ax
 14798 0000185E BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14799                                  					; disk changed!
 14800                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14801                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14802                                  		;clc
 14803 00001861 EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14804                                  
 14805                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14806                                  
 14807                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14808                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14809                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14810                                  ;
 14811                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14812                                  
 14813                                  checkio:				
 14814 00001863 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14815 00001866 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14816 00001868 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14817 0000186B 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14818 0000186D E888ED                  		call	GetBp
 14819 00001870 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14820 00001872 E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14821 00001875 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14822 00001877 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14823 00001879 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14824 0000187B 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14825 0000187C C3                      		retn
 14826                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14827                                  
 14828                                  checkioerr:				
 14829 0000187D E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14830                                  
 14831                                  checkioret:				
 14832 00001880 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14833 00001881 E9F7F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14834                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14835                                  
 14836                                  no_error_map:				
 14837 00001884 E9F7F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14838                                  
 14839                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14840                                  
 14841                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14842                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14843                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14844                                  
 14845                                  returnvid:		
 14846 00001887 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14847                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14848 0000188A E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14849 0000188D B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14850 0000188F F9                      		stc
 14851 00001890 C3                      		retn
 14852                                  
 14853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14854                                  
 14855                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14856                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14857                                  ;
 14858                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14859                                  ; **trashes si**
 14860                                  
 14861                                  media_set_vid:				
 14862 00001891 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14863                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14864                                  
 14865                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14866                                  
 14867                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14868                                  
 14869                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14870                                  
 14871                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14872                                  vid_into_packet:
 14873 00001894 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14874 00001895 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14875 00001899 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14876 0000189C 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14877 0000189E 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14878 000018A1 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14879 000018A4 1F                      		pop	ds
 14880                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14881 000018A5 C3                      		retn
 14882                                  
 14883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14884                                  
 14885                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14886                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14887                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14888                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14889                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14890                                  ;
 14891                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14892                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14893                                  ;
 14894                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14895                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14896                                  ;		carry set
 14897                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14898                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14899                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14900                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14901                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14902                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14903                                  ;
 14904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14905                                  
 14906                                  hidensity:
 14907                                  
 14908                                  ; check for correct drive
 14909                                  		
 14910                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14911 000018A6 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14912                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14913                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14914 000018AB 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14915                                  
 14916                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14917                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14918                                  
 14919 000018AD 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14920 000018B2 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14921                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14922                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14923 000018B4 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14924 000018B7 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14925                                  
 14926                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14927                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14928                                  
 14929 000018B9 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14930                                  					; ffOther
 14931 000018BE 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14932 000018C0 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14933                                  					; ff288
 14934 000018C5 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14935 000018C7 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14936 000018C9 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14937                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14938                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14939 000018CC B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14940                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14941                                  					; 2 sides
 14942 000018CF BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14943                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14944                                  					; & head max
 14945 000018D2 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14946 000018D5 E98FED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14947                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14948                                  
 14949                                  Is720K:					
 14950 000018D8 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14951 000018DB E950ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14952                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14953                                  
 14954                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14955                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14956                                  		;retn
 14957                                  
 14958                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14959                                  
 14960                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14961                                  
 14962                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14963                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14964                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14965                                  ;
 14966                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14967                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14968                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14969                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14970                                  ;
 14971                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14972                                  ;
 14973                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14974                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14975                                  
 14976                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14977 000018DE 06                      		push	es
 14978 000018DF 57                      		push	di
 14979                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14980                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14981 000018E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14982                                  
 14983                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14984                                  
 14985                                  scan_bds:				
 14986 000018E4 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14987 000018E8 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14988                                  
 14989                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14990                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14991                                  
 14992 000018EA 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14993                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14994                                  get_next_bds:				
 14995 000018EE 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14996                                  					; go to	next bds
 14997 000018F1 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14998 000018F4 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14999 000018F6 5F                      		pop	di
 15000 000018F7 07                      		pop	es
 15001 000018F8 C3                      		retn
 15002                                  
 15003                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15004                                  
 15005                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15006                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15007                                  ;
 15008                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15009                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15010                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15011                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15012                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15013                                  
 15014                                  checkromchange:	
 15015                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15016                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15017 000018F9 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15018                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15019                                  					; fchanged
 15020 000018FE C3                      		retn
 15021                                  
 15022                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15023                                  
 15024                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15025                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15026                                  ;
 15027                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15028                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15029                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15030                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15031                                  
 15032                                  resetchanged:	
 15033                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15034                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15035 000018FF 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15036                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15037                                  					; ~fchanged
 15038 00001904 C3                      		retn
 15039                                  
 15040                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15041                                  
 15042                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15043                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15044                                  ;
 15045                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15046                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15047                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15048                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15049                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15050                                  
 15051                                  haschange:
 15052                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15053                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15054 00001905 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15055                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15056                                  					; fchangeline
 15057 0000190A C3                      		retn
 15058                                  
 15059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15060                                  
 15061                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15062                                  
 15063                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15064                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15065                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15066                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15067                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15068                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15069                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15070                                  
 15071                                  ; set_volume_id
 15072                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15073                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15074                                  ;
 15075                                  ;   on entry:
 15076                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15077                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15078                                  ;
 15079                                  ;   on exit:
 15080                                  ;	carry clear:
 15081                                  ;	   successful call
 15082                                  ;	carry set
 15083                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15084                                  
 15085                                  set_volume_id:				
 15086 0000190B 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15087 0000190C 50                      		push	ax
 15088 0000190D E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15089 00001910 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15090 00001912 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15091 00001915 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15092 00001917 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15093 0000191A E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15094                                  setvret:				
 15095                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15096                                  		; cf = 0
 15097                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15098 0000191D 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15099 0000191E 5A                      		pop	dx
 15100 0000191F C3                      		retn
 15101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15102                                  
 15103                                  seterr:					
 15104 00001920 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15105 00001921 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15106 00001922 C3                      		retn
 15107                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15108 00001923 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15109                                  
 15110                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15111                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15112                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15113                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15114                                  
 15115                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15116                                  
 15117                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15118                                  
 15119                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15120                                  ;
 15121                                  ;   on entry:
 15122                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15123                                  ;
 15124                                  ;   on exit:
 15125                                  ;	carry clear
 15126                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15127                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15128                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15129                                  ;
 15130                                  ;	carry set:
 15131                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15132                                  
 15133                                  read_volume_id:
 15134 00001925 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15135 00001926 51                      		push	cx
 15136 00001927 53                      		push	bx
 15137 00001928 50                      		push	ax
 15138 00001929 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15139 0000192A 57                      		push	di
 15140 0000192B 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15141 0000192C 07                      		pop	es
 15142 0000192D BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15143 00001930 BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15144 00001933 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15145 00001936 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15146 00001938 5F                      		pop	di
 15147 00001939 07                      		pop	es
 15148 0000193A 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15149                                  					; # of fats
 15150 0000193E 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15151                                  					; sectors / fat
 15152 00001942 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15153 00001944 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15154                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15155                                  					;
 15156                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15157                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15158 00001948 2EA3[2319]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15159                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15160                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15161 0000194C 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15162                                  					; # root dir entries
 15163 00001950 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15164 00001952 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15165 00001954 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15166                                  next_sec:				
 15167 00001956 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15168 00001957 2EA1[2319]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15169                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15170                                  					; get sector #
 15171 0000195B 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15172                                  					; sectors / track
 15173 0000195F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15174 00001961 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15175                                  
 15176                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15177                                  
 15178 00001963 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15179                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15180 00001964 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15181 00001966 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15182 00001968 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15183                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15184 0000196C 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15185 0000196E 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15186 00001970 E804EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15187                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15188 00001973 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 15189 00001975 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15190 00001978 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15191                                  fvid_loop:				
 15192 0000197A 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15193 0000197D 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15194 0000197F 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15195 00001982 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15196 00001984 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15197 00001987 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15198                                  ent_loop:				
 15199 00001989 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15200 0000198C E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15201 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15202 0000198F 2EFF06[2319]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15203                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15204                                  					; next sector
 15205 00001994 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15206                                  notfound:				
 15207 00001996 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15208 00001998 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15209                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15210                                  
 15211                                  found_vid:				
 15212 0000199A 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15213 0000199B 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15214 0000199D 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15215 0000199E 57                      		push	di
 15216 0000199F 1E                      		push	ds
 15217 000019A0 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15218 000019A1 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15219 000019A4 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15220                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15221 000019A7 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15222 000019A9 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 15223 000019AB AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15224 000019AC 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15225 000019AE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15226 000019AF 07                      		pop	es
 15227                                  fvid_ret:				
 15228 000019B0 58                      		pop	ax
 15229                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15230                                  		; cf = 0
 15231                                  		;clc
 15232                                  rvidret:				
 15233 000019B1 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15234 000019B2 59                      		pop	cx
 15235 000019B3 5A                      		pop	dx
 15236 000019B4 C3                      		retn
 15237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15238                                  
 15239                                  no_vid:					
 15240 000019B5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15241 000019B6 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15243                                  
 15244                                  readviderr:				
 15245 000019B8 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15246 000019B9 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15247 000019BA EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15248                                  
 15249                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15250                                  
 15251                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15252                                  ;
 15253                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15254                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15255                                  
 15256                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 15257 000019BC 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15258 000019BD 56                      		push	si
 15259 000019BE 51                      		push	cx
 15260 000019BF BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15261                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15262 000019C2 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15263                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15264 000019C5 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15265 000019C8 FC                      		cld
 15266 000019C9 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15267 000019CB 59                      		pop	cx
 15268 000019CC 5E                      		pop	si
 15269 000019CD 5F                      		pop	di
 15270 000019CE C3                      		retn
 15271                                  
 15272                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15273                                  
 15274                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15275                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15276                                  ;
 15277                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15278                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15279                                  
 15280                                  check_volume_id:	
 15281 000019CF 57                      		push	di
 15282 000019D0 51                      		push	cx
 15283 000019D1 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15284                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15285 000019D4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15286                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15287 000019D7 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15288 000019DA FC                      		cld
 15289 000019DB F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15290 000019DD 59                      		pop	cx
 15291 000019DE 5F                      		pop	di
 15292 000019DF C3                      		retn
 15293                                  
 15294                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15295                                  
 15296                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15297                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15298                                  ;
 15299                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15300                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15301                                  ;
 15302                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15303                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15304                                  ;
 15305                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15306                                  
 15307                                  fat_check:		
 15308 000019E0 50                      		push	ax
 15309 000019E1 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15310 000019E3 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15311 000019E6 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15312                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15313 000019EA 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15314 000019EC 4E                      		dec	si
 15315                                  okret1:					
 15316 000019ED 58                      		pop	ax
 15317 000019EE C3                      		retn
 15318                                  
 15319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15320                                  
 15321                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15322                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15323                                  
 15324                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15325                                  
 15326                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15327                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15328                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15329                                  
 15330                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15331                                  
 15332                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15333                                  		;db 0
 15334                                  
 15335                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15336                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15337                                  
 15338                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15339 000019EF 00                      		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15340                                  %endif
 15341                                  
 15342                                  ;align 16
 15343                                  
 15344                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15345                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15346                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15347                                  BCODEEND:
 15348                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15349                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15350                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15351                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15352
