 30899                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30900                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30901                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30902                                  uf20:	
 30903                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30904                                  
 30905                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30906                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30907                                  
 30908                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30909                                  	mov     ax,es
 30910                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30911                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30912                                  	inc     ax
 30913                                  	mov     es,ax
 30914                                  
 30915                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30916                                  ufX:	
 30917                                  	pop	es
 30918                                  	pop	ax
 30919                                  	retn
 30920                                  
 30921                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30922                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30925                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30926                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30927                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30928                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30929                                  
 30930                                  isFrozMCB:
 30931                                  	;push	ax
 30932                                  
 30933                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30934                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30935                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30936                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30937                                  
 30938                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30939                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30940                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30941                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30942                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30943                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30944                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30945                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30946                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30947                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30948                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30949                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30950                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30951                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30952                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30953                                  ifmX:	
 30954                                  	;pop	ax
 30955                                  	retn
 30956                                  
 30957                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30958                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30959                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30960                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30961                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30962                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30963                                  ; USES:     None
 30964                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30965                                  
 30966                                  frezMCB:
 30967                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30968                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30969                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30970                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30971                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30972                                  	retn
 30973                                  
 30974                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30975                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30976                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30977                                  ; Entry:  None
 30978                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30979                                  ; Error:  None
 30980                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30981                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30982                                  
 30983                                  FreezeUM:
 30984                                  	push	ax
 30985                                  	push	cx
 30986                                  	push	dx
 30987                                  	push	es
 30988                                  
 30989                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30990                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30991                                  
 30992                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30993                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30994                                  
 30995                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30996                                  	mov	es,ax
 30997                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30998                                  
 30999                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31000                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31001                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31002                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31003                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31004                                  
 31005                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31006                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31007                                  
 31008                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31009                                  fum20:	
 31010                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31011                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31012                                  
 31013                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31014                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31015                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31016                                  
 31017                                  	call	frezMCB
 31018                                  fum30:	
 31019                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31020                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31021                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31022                                  
 31023                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31024                                  	mov     ax,es
 31025                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31026                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31027                                  	inc     ax
 31028                                  	mov     es,ax
 31029                                  	
 31030                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31031                                  
 31032                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31033                                  	pop	dx
 31034                                  	pop	cx
 31035                                  	pop	ax
 31036                                  	retn
 31037                                  
 31038                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31039                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31040                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31041                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31042                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31043                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31044                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31045                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31046                                  
 31047                                  UmbTest:
 31048                                  	push	ax
 31049                                  	push	bx
 31050                                  	push	ds
 31051                                  	push	es
 31052                                  
 31053                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31054                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31055                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31056                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31057                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31058                                  
 31059                                  	pop	es
 31060                                  	pop	ds
 31061                                  	pop	bx
 31062                                  	pop	ax
 31063                                  	retn
 31064                                  
 31065                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31066                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31067                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31068                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31069                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31070                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31071                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31072                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31073                                  
 31074                                  WalkMem:
 31075                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31076                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31077                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31078                                  		   	
 31079                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31080                                  	int	21h
 31081                                  
 31082                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31083                                  	mov	es,ax
 31084                                  
 31085                                  ; ------------------------------
 31086                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31087                                  ; ------------------------------
 31088                                  
 31089                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31090                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31091                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31092                                  
 31093                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31094                                  
 31095                                  	mov     bx,es
 31096                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31097                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31098                                  	inc     bx
 31099                                  	mov     es,bx
 31100                                  		
 31101                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31102                                  um20:	
 31103                                  	mov	ax,es
 31104                                  
 31105                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31106                                  
 31107                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31108                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31109                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31110                                  	retn
 31111                                  
 31112                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31113                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31115                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31116                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31117                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31118                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31119                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31120                                  
 31121                                  hl_unlink:
 31122                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31123                                  
 31124                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31125                                  	;
 31126                                  	;push	ds
 31127                                  	;push	cs
 31128                                  	;pop	ds
 31129                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31130                                  	;pop	ds
 31131                                  
 31132                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31133                                  
 31134                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31135                                  	int	21h
 31136                                  	retn
 31137                                  
 31138                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31139                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31140                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31141                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31142                                  
 31143                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31144                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31145                                  
 31146                                  ;   Modification log:
 31147                                  ;
 31148                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31149                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31150                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31151                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31152                                  
 31153                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31154                                  
 31155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31156                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31157                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31158                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31159                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31160                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31161                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31162                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31163                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31164                                  
 31165                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31166                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31167                                  
 31168                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31169                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31170                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31171                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31172                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31173                                  ;    every command execution.
 31174                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31175                                  
 31176                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31177                                  	;
 31178                                  	;push	ds
 31179                                  	;push	cs
 31180                                  	;pop	ds
 31181                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31182                                  	;pop	ds	
 31183                                  
 31184                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31185                                  
 31186                                  	or	al,al
 31187                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31188                                  
 31189                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31190                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31191                                  	retn			; that.
 31192                                  uhu10:	
 31193                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31194                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31195                                  
 31196                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31197                                  	;
 31198                                  	;push	es
 31199                                  	;push	cs
 31200                                  	;pop	es
 31201                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31202                                  	;pop	ds	
 31203                                  
 31204                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31205                                  
 31206                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31207                                  
 31208                                  	pop	ax
 31209                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31210                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31211                                  	retn
 31212                                  
 31213                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31214                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31215                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31216                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31217                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31218                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31219                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31220                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31221                                  
 31222                                  he_unlink:
 31223                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31224                                  
 31225                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31226                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31227                                  
 31228                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31229                                  	int	21h
 31230                                  	retn
 31231                                  
 31232                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31233                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31234                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31235                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31236                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31237                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31238                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31239                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31240                                  
 31241                                  FreeUMBs:
 31242                                  	push	ax
 31243                                  	push	es
 31244                                  
 31245                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31246                                  	jc	short fusX
 31247                                  
 31248                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31249                                  fus10:	
 31250                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31251                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31252                                  	call	freeMCB
 31253                                  fus20:	   
 31254                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31255                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31256                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31257                                  
 31258                                  	mov	ax,es
 31259                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31260                                  	inc	ax
 31261                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31262                                  
 31263                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31264                                  fusX:	
 31265                                  	pop	es
 31266                                  	pop	ax
 31267                                  	retn
 31268                                  
 31269                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31270                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31271                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31272                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31273                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31274                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31275                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31276                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31277                                  
 31278                                  isHideMCB:
 31279                                  	;push	ax
 31280                                  
 31281                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31282                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31283                                  
 31284                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31285                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31286                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31287                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31288                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31289                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31290                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31291                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31292                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31293                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31294                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31295                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31296                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31297                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31298                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31299                                  ihm_x:	
 31300                                  	;pop	ax
 31301                                  	retn
 31302                                  
 31303                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31304                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31305                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31306                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31307                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31308                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31309                                  ; USES:     AX
 31310                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31311                                  
 31312                                  freeMCB:
 31313                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31314                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31315                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31316                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31317                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31318                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31319                                  	retn
 31320                                  
 31321                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31322                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31323                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31324                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31325                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31326                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31327                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31328                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31329                                  
 31330                                  HeadUmb:
 31331                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31332                                  
 31333                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31334                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31335                                  	;push	es
 31336                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31337                                  
 31338                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31339                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31340                                  
 31341                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31342                                  	int	21h
 31343                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31344                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31345                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31346                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31347                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31348                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31349                                  
 31350                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31351                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31352                                  xhu_e:	
 31353                                  	;stc
 31354                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31355                                  xhu_x:	
 31356                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31357                                  	;pop	es	
 31358                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31359                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31360                                  	retn
 31361                                  
 31362                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31363                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31364                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31365                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31366                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31367                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31368                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31369                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31370                                  
 31371                                  linkumb:
 31372                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31373                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31374                                  
 31375                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31376                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31377                                  
 31378                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31379                                  	mov	bx,1
 31380                                  	int	21h
 31381                                  lumbX:
 31382                                  	retn
 31383                                  
 31384                                  %endif

 31386                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31387                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31388                                  
 31389                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31390                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31391                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31392                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31393                                  
 31394                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31395                                  ;
 31396                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31397                                  ;
 31398                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31399                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31400                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31401                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31402                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31403                                  ;
 31404                                  ;	Output : none
 31405                                  ;
 31406                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31407                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31408                                  ;
 31409                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31410                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31411                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31412                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31413                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31415                                  
 31416                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31417                                  InitDevLoad:
 31418                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31419                                  	; ds = cs
 31420 0000280C 803E[FB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31421                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31422                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31423 00002811 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31424                                  
 31425                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31426                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31427                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31428                                  ;
 31429                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31430                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31431                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31432                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31433                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31434                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31435                                  ;
 31436                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31437                                  ;
 31438                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31439                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31440                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31441                                  ;	pushf
 31442                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31443                                  ;	popf
 31444                                  ;
 31445                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31446                                  ;
 31447                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31448                                  
 31449                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31450                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31451                                  InitForConv:
 31452                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31453                                  	; ds = cs
 31454 00002813 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31455                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31456 00002816 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31457 00002818 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31458 0000281B E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31459 0000281E 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31460                                  					;  in low memory
 31461                                  InitForHi:
 31462                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31463                                  	; ds = cs
 31464                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31465                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31466                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31467 00002820 A1[F11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31468 00002823 8B16[ED1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31469 00002827 0316[EF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31470 0000282B EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31471                                  
 31472                                  InitForLo:
 31473                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31474                                  	; ds = cs
 31475                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31476 0000282D C606[FB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31477                                  initforlo_x:
 31478                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31479                                  	; ds = cs
 31480                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31481                                  					;  we are loading low
 31482                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31483                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31484 00002832 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31485 00002835 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31486                                  idl1:
 31487 00002839 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31488                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31489                                  	; ds = cs
 31490                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31491                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31492                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31493                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31494 0000283C A3[E01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31495 0000283F 8916[E21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31496 00002843 C706[E41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31497 00002849 A3[E61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31498 0000284C C3                      	retn
 31499                                  
 31500                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31501                                  ;
 31502                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31503                                  ;
 31504                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31505                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31506                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31507                                  ;		   current UMB
 31508                                  ;
 31509                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31510                                  
 31511                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31512                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31513                                  	; ds = cs
 31514                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31515                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31516                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31517 0000284D A1[EF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31518 00002850 0306[ED1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31519 00002854 2B06[F11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31520                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31521                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31522                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31523                                  	;stc
 31524                                  	;retn
 31525                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31526 00002858 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31527 0000285B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31528                                  spcinumb1:
 31529 0000285D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31530                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31531                                  	; ds = cs
 31532 0000285E 3B06[DE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31533                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31534                                  spcinumb2:
 31535 00002862 C3                      	retn
 31536                                  
 31537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31538                                  ;
 31539                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31540                                  ;
 31541                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31542                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31543                                  ;
 31544                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31545                                  
 31546                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31547                                  ;
 31548                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31549                                  ;	push	ds
 31550                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31551                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31552                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31553                                  ;	pop	ds
 31554                                  ;
 31555                                  ;	inc	ax
 31556                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31557                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31558                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31559                                  ;	retn
 31560                                  
 31561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31562                                  ;
 31563                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31564                                  ;
 31565                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31566                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31567                                  ;		 the device.
 31568                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31569                                  ;
 31570                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31571                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31572                                  ;	UMB.
 31573                                  ;
 31574                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31575                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31576                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31577                                  ;
 31578                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31579                                  
 31580                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31581                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31582                                  
 31583                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31584                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31585                                  	; ds = cs
 31586 00002863 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31587 00002866 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31588 00002869 CD21                    	int	21h
 31589                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31590                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31591                                  
 31592 0000286B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31593 0000286D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31594                                  
 31595 0000286F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31596                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31597                                  	; ds = cs
 31598 00002870 391E[DE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31599                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31600 00002874 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31601 00002876 43                      	inc	bx
 31602                                  
 31603 00002877 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31604 0000287A CD21                    	int	21h
 31605 0000287C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31606                                  
 31607                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31608                                  	;dec	ax
 31609                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31610                                  	;
 31611                                  PrepareMark:
 31612 0000287E 1E                      	push	ds
 31613 0000287F 48                      	dec	ax
 31614 00002880 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31615 00002882 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8

 31646                                  ;
 31647                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31648                                  ;
 31649                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31650                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31651                                  ;
 31652                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31653                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31654                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31655                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31656                                  ;
 31657                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31658                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31659                                  ;
 31660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31661                                  
 31662                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31663                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31664                                  
 31665                                  DevSetMark:

 31667 000028A9 57                      	push	di
 31668 000028AA 1E                      	push	ds
 31669 000028AB 56                      	push	si

 31671 000028AE 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31672 000028B4 40                      	inc	ax
 31673 000028B5 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31674                                  
 31675                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31676                                  
 31677 000028B9 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31678 000028BA 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31679                                  
 31680 000028BF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31681 000028C1 FC                      	cld
 31682                                  dsm_again:
 31683 000028C2 AC                      	lodsb
 31684 000028C3 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31685 000028C5 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31686 000028C7 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31687 000028C9 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31688                                  isit_slash:
 31689 000028CB 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31690 000028CD 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31691 000028CF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31692 000028D1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31693                                  isit_null:
 31694 000028D3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31695 000028D5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31696 000028D7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31697                                  
 31698 000028D9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31699 000028DC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31700                                  dsm_next_char:
 31701 000028DF AC                      	lodsb
 31702 000028E0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31703 000028E2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31704 000028E4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31705 000028E6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31706 000028E8 AA                      	stosb
 31707 000028E9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31708                                  blankout:
 31709 000028EB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31710 000028ED B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31711 000028EF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31712                                  dsm_exit:

 31714 000028F2 5E                      	pop	si
 31715 000028F3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31716 000028F4 5F                      	pop	di
 31717 000028F5 07                      	pop	es
 31718 000028F6 C3                      	retn

 31722                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31723                                  ;
 31724                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31725                                  ;
 31726                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31727                                  ;
 31728                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31729                                  ;	in DevSize
 31730                                  ;
 31731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31732                                  
 31733                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31734                                  SizeDevice:
 31735                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31736                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 31741 000028FC B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31742 000028FF CD21                    	int	21h
 31743 00002901 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31744                                  
 31745 00002903 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31746 00002905 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31747 00002908 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx

 31749 0000290C CD21                    	int	21h
 31750 0000290E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31751 00002910 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31752 00002913 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31753 00002916 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31754 0000291A 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31755 0000291C 2EC706[DE1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31756                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31757 00002923 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31758                                  szdev1:
 31759 00002925 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31760 00002927 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31761 00002929 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31762 0000292B D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31763 0000292D 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31764                                  	;
 31765                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31766 0000292F 2E3B06[FC1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31767                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31768                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31769 00002934 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2

 31772 0000293A F8                      	clc
 31773                                  szdev2:
 31774 0000293B 2EA3[DE1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size

 31776                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31777                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31778                                  	; cf=0
 31779                                  	;clc
 31780                                  sd_close:

 31782                                  					;  carry flag

 31785 00002945 9D                      	popf

 32101                                  ;
 32102                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32103                                  ;
 32104                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32105                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32106                                  ;
 32107                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32108                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32109                                  ;
 32110                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32111                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32112                                  ;
 32113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32114                                  
 32115                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32116                                  
 32117                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32118                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32119                                  GetHexNum:
 32120 00002A2B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32121 00002A2D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32122                                  ghn_next:
 32123 00002A2F 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32124 00002A32 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32125 00002A35 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32126 00002A37 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32127 00002A3A 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32128 00002A3C 50                      	push	ax
 32129 00002A3D 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32130 00002A3F E83706                  	call	delim
 32131 00002A42 58                      	pop	ax
 32132                                  	; 04/01/2023

 32188 00002A77 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32189 00002A79 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc

 32289                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32290                                  ;
 32291                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32292                                  ;
 32293                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32294                                  ;
 32295                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32296                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32297                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32298                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32299                                  ;				NC
 32300                                  ;			  else 
 32301                                  ;				CY
 32302                                  ;
 32303                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32304                                  ;
 32305                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32306                                  
 32307                                  umb_allocate:
 32308                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32309                                  	; ds = cs
 32310 00002ACC 50                      	push	ax
 32311 00002ACD B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32312 00002ACF BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32313                                  					;   possible
 32314                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32315 00002AD2 FF1E[F31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32316                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32317                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32318                                  					; the largest UMB
 32319 00002AD6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32320 00002AD8 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32321                                  	
 32322 00002ADA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32323                                  
 32324                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32325 00002ADC FF1E[F31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32326                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32327                                  
 32328 00002AE0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32329 00002AE3 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32330                                  	;clc
 32331                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32332                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32333                                  	; cf=0
 32334                                  	;clc 
 32335                                  ua_done:
 32336 00002AE5 58                      	pop	ax
 32337 00002AE6 C3                      	retn

 32342                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32343                                  ;
 32344                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32345                                  ;
 32346                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32347                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32348                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32349                                  ;			; DS = data
 32350                                  ;
 32351                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32352                                  ;
 32353                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32354                                  ;
 32355                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32356                                  
 32357                                  umb_insert:
 32358 00002AEA 1E                      	push	ds
 32359                                  
 32360                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32361                                  	; ds = cs
 32362                                  
 32363                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32364 00002AEB 8E1E[0A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32365                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32366 00002AEF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32367 00002AF3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32368 00002AF5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32369                                  ui_next:
 32370 00002AF7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32371                                  					;    new block
 32372 00002AF9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32373                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32374                                  					;    last
 32375 00002AFB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32376 00002B01 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32377                                  					; N: get next block
 32378 00002B03 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32379                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32380 00002B05 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32381 00002B08 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32382                                  
 32383                                  ui_insert:
 32384 00002B0A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32385 00002B0C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32386                                  
 32387 00002B0D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32388 00002B0F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32389                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32390 00002B11 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32391                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32392 00002B16 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32393                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32394 00002B1C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32395                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32396 00002B20 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32397                                  
 32398                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32399                                  
 32400 00002B26 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32401 00002B28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32402 00002B2E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32403                                  					; mark as free
 32404 00002B35 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32405                                  					; start & end of new block
 32406 00002B38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32407                                  
 32408                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32409                                  	
 32410 00002B3D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32411 00002B3F 43                      	inc	bx
 32412 00002B40 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32413 00002B42 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32414                                  
 32415                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32416                                  					; this block
 32417 00002B43 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32418                                  	
 32419 00002B45 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32420 00002B4B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32421 00002B52 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32422 00002B56 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32423                                  
 32424 00002B5D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32425                                  
 32426                                  ui_append:
 32427                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32428 00002B5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32429 00002B64 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32430                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32431                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32432                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32433 00002B6A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32434                                  
 32435 00002B70 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32436 00002B72 40                      	inc	ax
 32437 00002B73 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32438                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32439 00002B75 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32440                                  
 32441 00002B77 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32442                                  
 32443 00002B79 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32444 00002B7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32445 00002B86 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32446 00002B8A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32447                                  
 32448                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32449 00002B91 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32450 00002B93 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32451 00002B99 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32452                                  					; mark as free
 32453 00002BA0 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32454 00002BA1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32455                                  ui_done:
 32456                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32457 00002BA6 1F                      	pop	ds

 32460 00002BA7 C3                      	retn
