 35365                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35366                                  
 35367                                  disp_input:
 35368                                          push    ax
 35369                                          cmp     al,' '
 35370                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35371                                          mov     al,' '
 35372                                  disp_ok:
 35373                                          mov     dl,al
 35374                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35375                                          int     21h
 35376                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35377                                          call    print
 35378                                          pop     ax
 35379                                          retn
 35380                                  
 35381                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35382                                  
 35383                                  disp_num:
 35384                                          push    bx
 35385                                          add     al,'0'
 35386                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35387                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35388                                          mov     cx,1
 35389                                          int     10h
 35390                                          pop     bx
 35391                                          retn
 35392                                  
 35393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35394                                  ;
 35395                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ;   INPUT
 35398                                  ;       None
 35399                                  ;
 35400                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35401                                  ;       None
 35402                                  ;
 35403                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35404                                  ;       None
 35405                                  ;
 35406                                  ;   NOTES
 35407                                  ;       None
 35408                                  ;
 35409                                  ;   HISTORY
 35410                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35411                                  ;
 35412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35413                                  
 35414                                  show_status:
 35415                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35416                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35417                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35418                                          int     10h             ;
 35419                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35420                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35421                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35422                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35423                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35424                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35425                                          int     10h             ;
 35426                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35427                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35428                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35429                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35430                                  show_onoff: 
 35431                                          int     10h
 35432                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35433                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35434                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35435                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35436                                  
 35437                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35438                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35439                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35440                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35441                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35442                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35443                                          int     10h             ;
 35444                                  show_done:                      ;
 35445                                          pop     dx              ;
 35446                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35447                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35448                                          pop     bx              ;
 35449                                          retn			;
 35450                                  
 35451                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35452                                  
 35453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35454                                  ;
 35455                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35456                                  ;
 35457                                  ;   INPUT
 35458                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35459                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35460                                  ;
 35461                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35462                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35463                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35464                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35465                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35466                                  ;
 35467                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35468                                  ;       AX
 35469                                  ;
 35470                                  ;   NOTES
 35471                                  ;       None
 35472                                  ;
 35473                                  ;   HISTORY
 35474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35475                                  ;
 35476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35477                                  
 35478                                  skip_token:
 35479                                          call    get_char
 35480                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35481                                          call    any_delim
 35482                                          jne	short skip_token
 35483                                  skip_check_eol:
 35484                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35485                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35486                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35487                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35488                                          clc
 35489                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35490                                  	retn
 35491                                  skip_token_eol:
 35492                                          stc
 35493                                  skip_token_done:
 35494                                          retn
 35495                                  
 35496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   INPUT
 35501                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35502                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35503                                  ;
 35504                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35505                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35506                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35507                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35508                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35509                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35510                                  ;
 35511                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35512                                  ;       AX
 35513                                  ;
 35514                                  ;   NOTES
 35515                                  ;       None
 35516                                  ;
 35517                                  ;   HISTORY
 35518                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35519                                  ;
 35520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35521                                  
 35522                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35523                                          call    get_char        ;
 35524                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35525                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35526                                          call    delim           ;
 35527                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35528                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35529                                  
 35530                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35531                                  ;
 35532                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35533                                  ;
 35534                                  ;   INPUT
 35535                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35536                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35537                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35538                                  ;
 35539                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35540                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35541                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35542                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35543                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35544                                  ;
 35545                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35546                                  ;       AX
 35547                                  ;
 35548                                  ;   NOTES
 35549                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35550                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35551                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35552                                  ;
 35553                                  ;   HISTORY
 35554                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35555                                  ;
 35556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35557                                  
 35558                                  skip_opt_line:
 35559                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35560                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35561                                       
 35562                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35563                                  
 35564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35565                                  ;
 35566                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35567                                  ;
 35568                                  ;   INPUT
 35569                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35570                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35571                                  ;
 35572                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35573                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35574                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35575                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35576                                  ;
 35577                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35578                                  ;       AX
 35579                                  ;
 35580                                  ;   NOTES
 35581                                  ;       None
 35582                                  ;
 35583                                  ;   HISTORY
 35584                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35585                                  ;
 35586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35587                                  
 35588                                  skip_line:
 35589                                          call    get_char
 35590                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35591                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35592                                          jne	short skip_line
 35593                                  skip_line_done:
 35594                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35595                                          retn
 35596                                  
 35597                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35598                                  ;
 35599                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35600                                  ;
 35601                                  ;   INPUT
 35602                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35603                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35604                                  ;
 35605                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35606                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35607                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35608                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35609                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35610                                  ;
 35611                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35612                                  ;       AX
 35613                                  ;
 35614                                  ;   NOTES
 35615                                  ;       None
 35616                                  ;
 35617                                  ;   HISTORY
 35618                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35619                                  ;
 35620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35621                                  
 35622                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35623                                  
 35624                                  get_number:
 35625                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35626                                  num_loop:
 35627                                          call    get_char        ;
 35628                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35629                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35630                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35631                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35632                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35633                                          push    ax              ;
 35634                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35635                                          push    dx              ;
 35636                                          mul     bx              ;
 35637                                          pop     dx              ;
 35638                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35639                                          pop     ax              ;
 35640                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35641                                          cbw                     ;
 35642                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35643                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35644                                  
 35645                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35646                                  ;num_done:
 35647                                          ;retn
 35648                                  
 35649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35650                                  ;
 35651                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35652                                  ;
 35653                                  ;   INPUT
 35654                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35655                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35656                                  ;
 35657                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35658                                  ;       AL == next character
 35659                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35660                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35661                                  ;
 35662                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35663                                  ;       AX
 35664                                  ;
 35665                                  ;   NOTES
 35666                                  ;       None
 35667                                  ;
 35668                                  ;   HISTORY
 35669                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35670                                  ;
 35671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35672                                  
 35673                                  get_char:
 35674                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35675                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35676                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35677                                  	es	
 35678                                  	lodsb
 35679                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35680                                          retn			;
 35681                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35682                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35683                                  nearby_ret:
 35684                                          retn
 35685                                  
 35686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35687                                  ;
 35688                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35689                                  ;
 35690                                  ;   INPUT
 35691                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35692                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35693                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35694                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35695                                  ;
 35696                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35697                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35698                                  ;
 35699                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35700                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35701                                  ;
 35702                                  ;   NOTES
 35703                                  ;       None
 35704                                  ;
 35705                                  ;   HISTORY
 35706                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35707                                  ;
 35708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35709                                  
 35710                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35711                                  query_user:
 35712                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35713                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35714                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35715                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35716                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35717                                  qu_1:
 35718                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35719                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35720                                          push    ax                      ;
 35721                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35722                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35723                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35724                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35725                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35726                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35727                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35728                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35729                                  query_all:
 35730                                  
 35731                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35732                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35733                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35734                                  
 35735                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35736                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35737                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35738                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35739                                  
 35740                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35741                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35742                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35743                                  find_match:                             ;
 35744                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35745                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35746                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35747                                          inc     di                      ;
 35748                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35749                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35750                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35751                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35752                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35753                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35754                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35755                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35756                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35757                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35758                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35759                                          inc     di                      ;
 35760                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35761                                          int     21h                     ;
 35762                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35763                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35764                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35765                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35766                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35767                                  cmd_notset:
 35768                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35769                                  line_print:                             ;
 35770                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35771                                          es
 35772                                  	lodsb
 35773                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35774                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35775                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35776                                  non_null:                               ;
 35777                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35778                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35779                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35780                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35781                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35782                                  non_space:                              ;
 35783                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35784                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35785                                          int     21h                     ;
 35786                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35787                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35788                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35789                                  
 35790                                  generic_prompt:
 35791                                          call    print                   ;
 35792                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35793                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35794                                          int     16h                     ;
 35795                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35796                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35797                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35798                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35799                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35800                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35801                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35802                                  not_func:
 35803                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35804                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35805                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35806                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35807                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35808                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35809                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35810                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35811                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35812                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35813                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35814                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35815                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35816                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35817                                  
 35818                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35819                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35820                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35821                                  	clc
 35822                                  do_cmd:
 35823                                  	pop     ax			;
 35824                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35825                                  	; cf=0
 35826                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35827                                  	retn
 35828                                  
 35829                                  skip_cmd:
 35830                                  	pop     ax			;
 35831                                  skip_all:
 35832                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35833                                  	stc
 35834                                  	retn
 35835                                  
 35836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35837                                  ;
 35838                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35839                                  ;
 35840                                  ;   INPUT
 35841                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35842                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35843                                  ;
 35844                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35845                                  ;       None
 35846                                  ;
 35847                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35848                                  ;       None
 35849                                  ;
 35850                                  ;   NOTES
 35851                                  ;       None
 35852                                  ;
 35853                                  ;   HISTORY
 35854                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35855                                  ;
 35856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35857                                  
 35858                                  print_error:
 35859                                          push    ax
 35860                                          push    bx
 35861                                          push    cx
 35862                                          push    dx
 35863                                          push    ds
 35864                                          push    cs
 35865                                          pop     ds
 35866                                          pushf
 35867                                          call    get_linenum
 35868                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35869                                          call    error_line
 35870                                          popf
 35871                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35872                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35873                                          call    print
 35874                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35875                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35876                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35877                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35878                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35879                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35880                                  pe_1:     
 35881                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35882                                          call    print
 35883                                  pe_ret: 
 35884                                  	pop     ds
 35885                                          pop     dx
 35886                                          pop     cx
 35887                                          pop     bx
 35888                                          pop     ax
 35889                                  	retn
 35890                                  
 35891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35892                                  
 35893                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35894                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35895                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35896                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35897                                  
 35898                                  disable_autoexec:
 35899                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35900                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35901                                  
 35902                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35903                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35904                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35905                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35906                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35907                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35908                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35909                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35910                                  dae_1:
 35911                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35912                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35913                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35914                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35915                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35916                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35917                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35918                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35919                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35920                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35921                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35922                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35923                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35924                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35925                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35926                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35927                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35928                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35929                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35930                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35931                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35932                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35933                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35934                                          retn
 35935                                  
 35936                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35937                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35938                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35939                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35940                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35941                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35942                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35943                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35944                                  
 35945                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35946                                  
 35947                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35948                                  
 35949                                  
 35950                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35951                                  
 35952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35953                                  ;
 35954                                  ; procedure : delim
 35955                                  ;
 35956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35957                                  
 35958                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35959                                  ;
 35960                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35961                                  ;
 35962                                  ;any_delim:
 35963                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35964                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35965                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35966                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35967                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35968                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35969                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35970                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35971                                  ;
 35972                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35973                                  
 35974                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35975                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35976                                  delim:
 35977 00003079 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35978 0000307B 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35979                                  
 35980 0000307D 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35981 0000307F 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35982                                  
 35983                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35984 00003081 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35985 00003083 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35986 00003085 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35987 00003087 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35988 00003089 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35989 0000308B 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35990 0000308D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35991 0000308F 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35992 00003091 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35993                                  
 35994                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35995                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35996                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35997                                  ;	clc
 35998                                  ;;endif
 35999                                  
 36000                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36001                                  delim_ret:
 36002 00003093 C3                      	retn
 36003

 36006                                  ; procedure : newline
 36007                                  ;
 36008                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 36009                                  ;
 36010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36011                                  
 36012                                  newline:
 36013 00003094 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 36014 00003097 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 36015 00003099 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 36016 0000309B 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 36017 0000309D E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 36018                                  nl_ret:
 36019 000030A0 C3                      	retn

 36022                                  ; 
 36023                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36024                                  ;
 36025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36026                                  
 36027                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36028                                  mapcase:
 36029 000030A1 51                      	push	cx
 36030 000030A2 56                      	push	si
 36031 000030A3 1E                      	push	ds
 36032                                  
 36033 000030A4 06                      	push	es
 36034 000030A5 1F                      	pop	ds
 36035                                  
 36036                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36037                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36040                                  ;;else
 36041                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36042                                  ;;endif
 36043                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36044 000030A6 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36045                                  
 36046                                  convloop:
 36047 000030A8 AC                      	lodsb
 36048 000030A9 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36049 000030AB 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36050 000030AD 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36051 000030AF 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36052 000030B1 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36053 000030B3 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36054                                  noconv:
 36055                                  
 36056                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36057                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36058                                  ;;
 36059                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36060                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36061                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36062                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36063                                  ;;
 36064                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36065                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36066                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36067                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36068                                  ;check_eol:
 36069                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36070                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36071                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36072                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36073                                  ;;endif
 36074                                  	
 36075                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36076 000030B6 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36077                                  convdone:
 36078 000030B8 1F                      	pop	ds
 36079 000030B9 5E                      	pop	si
 36080 000030BA 59                      	pop	cx
 36081 000030BB C3                      	retn
 36082                                  
 36083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36084                                  ;
 36085                                  ; procedure : round
 36086                                  ;
 36087                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36088                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36089                                  ;
 36090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36091                                  
 36092                                  round:
 36093 000030BC 50                      	push	ax
 36094 000030BD 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36095                                  
 36096 000030C1 E8F5DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36097                                  
 36098 000030C4 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36099 000030C9 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36100 000030D0 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36101 000030D4 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36102 000030D9 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 36103 000030DB 2EF606[2E14]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36104 000030E1 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36105 000030E3 06                      	push	es
 36106 000030E4 56                      	push	si
 36107 000030E5 2E8B36[2C14]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36108 000030EA 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36109 000030EC 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36110 000030EE 48                      	dec	ax
 36111                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36112 000030EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36113 000030F3 2E8026[2E14]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36114 000030F9 5E                      	pop	si
 36115 000030FA 07                      	pop	es
 36116                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36117 000030FB 58                      	pop	ax
 36118                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36119                                  	; cf = 0
 36120                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36121                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36122 000030FC C3                      	retn
 36123                                  
 36124                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36125                                  
 36126                                  mem_err:
 36127                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36128 000030FD 0E                      	push	cs
 36129 000030FE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36130                                  mem_err2:
 36131 000030FF BA[9D38]                	mov	dx,badmem
 36132                                  	;push	cs
 36133                                  	;pop	ds
 36134 00003102 E87602                  	call	print
 36135 00003105 E945D7                  	jmp	stall

 36163                                  todigit:
 36164 0000312B 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 36165                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 36166                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36167 0000312D 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36168                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36169                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36170                                  	;clc
 36171                                  	;retn
 36172                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36173 0000312F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 36174 00003131 F5                      	cmc
 36175                                  notdig:
 36176                                  	;stc
 36177                                  notdig2:

 36180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36181                                  ;
 36182                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36185                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36186                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36187                                  ;
 36188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36189                                  
 36190                                  getnum:
 36191 00003133 53                      	push	bx
 36192 00003134 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36193                                  b2:
 36194 00003136 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36195 00003139 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36196                                  
 36197 0000313B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36198 0000313C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36199                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36200                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36201 0000313D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36202 0000313F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36203 00003141 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36204 00003142 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36205 00003144 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36206 00003147 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36207                                  
 36208 00003149 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36209                                  
 36210 0000314A E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36211 0000314D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36212 0000314F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36213 00003151 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36214 00003153 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36215 00003155 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36216 00003157 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36217 00003159 7417                    	je	short b15
 36218 0000315B 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36219 00003160 7410                    	je	short b15
 36220 00003162 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36221                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36222                                  	;nop
 36223                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36224                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36225                                  	;nop
 36226                                  	;nop
 36227 00003164 740C                    	je	short b15
 36228 00003166 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36229 00003168 7408                    	je	short b15
 36230 0000316A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36231 0000316C 7404                    	je	short b15
 36232 0000316E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36233 00003170 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36234                                  b15:
 36235 00003172 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36236 00003177 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36237                                  b1:
 36238 0000317C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36239 0000317E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36240 00003180 5B                      	pop	bx
 36241 00003181 C3                      	retn
 36242                                  badnum:
 36243                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36244                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36245 00003182 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36246                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36247 00003184 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36248 00003188 5B                      	pop	bx
 36249 00003189 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36250 0000318A C3                      	retn
 36251                                  
 36252                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36253                                  
 36254                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36255                                  
 36256                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36257                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36258                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36259                                  ;	si = 0
 36260                                  ;	ax = country id
 36261                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36262                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36263                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36264                                  ;
 36265                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36266                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36267                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36268                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36270                                  
 36271 0000318B 57                      	push	di
 36272 0000318C 50                      	push	ax
 36273 0000318D 52                      	push	dx
 36274                                  
 36275 0000318E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36276 00003190 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36277 00003192 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36278 00003195 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36279 00003198 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36280                                  
 36281 0000319A 06                      	push	es
 36282 0000319B 56                      	push	si
 36283                                  
 36284 0000319C 0E                      	push	cs
 36285 0000319D 07                      	pop	es
 36286                                  
 36287 0000319E BF[BF34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36288 000031A1 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36289 000031A4 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36290                                  
 36291 000031A6 5E                      	pop	si
 36292 000031A7 07                      	pop	es
 36293 000031A8 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36294                                  
 36295 000031AA 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36296 000031AD 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36297 000031B0 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36298                                  
 36299 000031B2 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36300 000031B3 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36301 000031B5 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36302 000031B8 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36303 000031BB E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36304 000031BE 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36305                                  
 36306 000031C0 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36307 000031C2 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36308 000031C6 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36309                                  
 36310 000031C8 46                      	inc	si
 36311 000031C9 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36312 000031CA 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36313 000031CB 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36314 000031CC 5F                      	pop	di
 36315                                  
 36316                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36317 000031CD 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36318 000031D0 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36319                                  
 36320 000031D2 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36321 000031D5 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36322 000031D7 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36323 000031DA 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36324                                  
 36325                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36326 000031DC 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36327 000031DE 46                      	inc	si
 36328 000031DF 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36329 000031E0 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36330                                  
 36331 000031E2 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36332                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36333 000031E5 F9                      	stc
 36334 000031E6 C3                      	retn
 36335                                  
 36336                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36337 000031E7 5E                      	pop	si
 36338 000031E8 59                      	pop	cx
 36339 000031E9 5F                      	pop	di
 36340 000031EA EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36341                                  
 36342                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36343 000031EC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36344                                  
 36345                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36346 000031EF 2E8916[C734]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36347 000031F4 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36348 000031F7 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36349 000031FA B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36350 000031FD E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36351 00003200 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36352                                  
 36353 00003202 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36354 00003204 46                      	inc	si
 36355 00003205 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36356                                  
 36357                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36358 00003206 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36359 00003207 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36360 00003208 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36361                                  
 36362 00003209 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36363 0000320C E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36364 0000320F 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36365                                  
 36366 00003211 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36367 00003214 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36368 00003217 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36369 0000321A F9                      	stc
 36370 0000321B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36371 0000321D 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36372                                  
 36373 0000321F BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36374 00003222 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36375 00003225 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36376 00003227 F9                      	stc
 36377 00003228 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36378 0000322A 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36379                                  
 36380 0000322C 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36381 0000322E 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36382                                  
 36383 00003230 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36384 00003233 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36385 00003236 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36386 00003239 F9                      	stc
 36387 0000323A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36388 0000323C 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36389                                  
 36390 0000323E 56                      	push	si
 36391 0000323F BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36392 00003242 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36393 00003244 5E                      	pop	si
 36394 00003245 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36395 00003248 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36396 0000324B B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36397 0000324D F9                      	stc
 36398 0000324E CD21                    	int	21h
 36399 00003250 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36400                                  
 36401 00003252 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36402 00003254 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36403                                  
 36404 00003256 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36405 00003259 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36406 0000325C 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36407 0000325E 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36408 0000325F 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36409 00003260 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36410 00003264 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36411                                  
 36412                                  	;if	bugfix
 36413 00003266 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36414                                  	;endif
 36415                                  
 36416 00003269 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36417 0000326B 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36418                                  
 36419 0000326D 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36420                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36421 00003271 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36422                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36423                                  	
 36424 00003275 57                      	push	di			;save di
 36425                                  
 36426 00003276 50                      	push	ax
 36427 00003277 2EA1[C734]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36428 0000327B 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36429 0000327E 58                      	pop	ax
 36430                                  
 36431                                  setdoscntry_mov:

 36433 00003281 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
 36434 00003283 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_data_next
 36435

 36437 00003286 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 36438                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 36439 0000328A 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36440                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 36441                                  
 36442                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 36443 0000328E 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 36444 0000328F 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 36445 00003290 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 36446 00003291 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36447 00003293 46                      	inc	si
 36448 00003294 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36449 00003295 49                      	dec	cx
 36450 00003296 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36451 00003299 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36452 0000329B E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 36453                                  
 36454                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36455                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 36456                                  	;retn

 36459                                  
 36460                                  	;if	bugfix
 36461                                  
 36462                                  setdbcs_before_copy:
 36463 0000329E 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 36464 000032A0 7516                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 36465 000032A2 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36466 000032A6 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 36467                                  
 36468 000032A8 57                      	push	di
 36469 000032A9 50                      	push	ax
 36470 000032AA 51                      	push	cx
 36471 000032AB 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		; load block length
 36472 000032AE 83C702                  	add	di,2			; points actual data
 36473 000032B1 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; fill bytes

 36475 000032B5 59                      	pop	cx
 36476 000032B6 58                      	pop	ax
 36477 000032B7 5F                      	pop	di
 36478                                  sdbcsbc:

 36480 000032B8 C3                      	retn

 36485                                  
 36486                                  getcountrydestination:
 36487                                  
 36488                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36489                                  ;input: al - data id
 36490                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36491                                  ;on return:
 36492                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36493                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36494                                  
 36495 000032B9 51                      	push	cx
 36496                                  	;add	di,74
 36497 000032BA 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36498                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36499 000032BD 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36500 000032C0 47                      	inc	di
 36501 000032C1 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36502                                  
 36503                                  getcntrydest:
 36504 000032C2 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 36505 000032C5 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 36506 000032C7 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 36507 000032CB 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 36508                                  
 36509 000032CD 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36510 000032D0 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36511                                  
 36512                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36513                                  	;add	di,41
 36514 000032D2 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36515                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 36516 000032D5 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 36517 000032D7 F9                      	stc
 36518 000032D8 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36519                                  
 36520                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 36521 000032DA 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 36522 000032DC 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 36523                                  
 36524 000032DE 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 36525 000032DF EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36526                                  
 36527                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 36528 000032E1 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 36529                                  
 36530                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 36531 000032E5 59                      	pop	cx
 36532 000032E6 C3                      	retn

 36535                                  
 36536                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36537                                  
 36538                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36539                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36540                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36541                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36542                                  ;	 be moved.
 36543                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36544                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36545                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36546                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36547                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36548                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36549                                  
 36550 000032E7 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36551 000032E8 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36552 000032EB F9                      	stc
 36553 000032EC CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36554 000032EE 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36555 000032EF 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36556                                  
 36557 000032F1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36558 000032F3 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36559 000032F5 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36560 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36561 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36562                                  ricb_exit:
 36563 000032FA C3                      	retn
 36564
