 36566                                  
 36567                                  set_country_path:
 36568                                  
 36569                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36570                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36571                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36572                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36573                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36574                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36575                                  
 36576 000032FB 56                      	push	si
 36577                                  
 36578 000032FC 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36579 000032FD 06                      	push	es
 36580 000032FE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36581 000032FF 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 36582                                  
 36583 00003300 E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 36584 00003303 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 36585                                  
 36586 00003305 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36587 00003307 46                      	inc	si
 36588 00003308 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 36589 00003309 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 36590                                  
 36591                                  scp_default_drv:
 36592 0000330B B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36593 0000330D CD21                    	int	21h
 36594 0000330F 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36595                                  
 36596                                  scp_setdrv:
 36597 00003311 2EA2[7C34]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36598 00003315 BF[7F34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36599 00003318 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36600 0000331A 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36601 0000331C 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36602                                  
 36603 0000331E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36604 00003320 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36605                                  
 36606 00003322 EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36607                                  
 36608                                  scp_root_dir:
 36609 00003324 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36610                                  scp_path:
 36611 00003325 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36612                                  
 36613 00003328 BF[7C34]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36614                                  scpath_exit:
 36615                                  
 36616 0000332B 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36617 0000332C 06                      	push	es
 36618 0000332D 1F                      	pop	ds
 36619 0000332E 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36620                                  
 36621 0000332F 5E                      	pop	si
 36622 00003330 C3                      	retn
 36623                                  
 36624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36625                                  
 36626                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36627                                  
 36628                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36629                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36630                                  ;carry set if not.
 36631                                  
 36632 00003331 50                      	push	ax
 36633 00003332 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 36634                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 36635 00003335 720E                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 36636 00003337 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 36637 0000333A 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 36638 0000333C 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 36639 00003340 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
 36640                                  
 36641 00003342 EB01                    	jmp	short cdletter_exit
 36642
